name: Maze Quest Master: Builder
description: "Embark on a thrilling journey in 'Maze Quest Master - Builder.' Conquer intricate mazes, collect coins, and master wall-bound movement. Become the ultimate maze explorer!"

name: My Boss Leidi
description: A short 18+ kinetic novel about an exhausted college student and his boss.

name: Nude and Afraid: 11 Day Challenge
description: Take part in a 11 day dating survival challenge with four different partners in various biomes. You'll hunt, craft, forage, and defend your camp, as you romance your partner and build a relationship that goes beyond the challenge.

name: A.I.Liens
description: A.I.LIENS - A 3rd Person Shooter RPG with Advanced A.I., Abilities, Player Stats, Inventory, Loot, Dialogue, Interaction, Firearms, Melee Weapons, Weapon Upgrades, Save/Load and much more

name: Arcade Sundown
description: Challenge the pinball people! Get shrunk down and play a mad points-scoring game inside pinball machines. Feint, travel, and tackle your way to high score glory — all’s fair under the glass.

name: Wizard with a Gun: Deluxe Edition
description: Wizard with a Gun is an online sandbox survival game for 1 - 2 players set in a magical wilderness wrought with dangerous creatures and arcane mysteries. Embark on a journey alone or with a friend to collect, craft, and outfit your wizard however you see fit as you explore the unknown.

name: Harvest Moon: The Winds of Anthos - Visitors From Afar Pack
description: A new chapter, new characters, and even a new bachelor and bachelorette await you in the Visitors From Afar Pack! The Verne Trading Company has arrived and is eager to set up business! But starting any new business can be challenging! What kind of unforeseen bottlenecks await your new guests? Will they see a return on investment, or are they destined to stay in the red? Help them launch their new brand all across Anthos!

name: Layover Lovers
description: An unlikely romantic encounter at a turning point in their lives

name: Maze Quest Master
description: "Embark on a thrilling journey in 'Maze Quest Master.' Conquer intricate mazes, collect coins, and master wall-bound movement. Become the ultimate maze explorer!"

name: War Robots Shooting Simulator
description: Join the epic battle in deep space with War Robots Shooting Simulator! Create your robot hero, determine your strategy, and destroy enemies.

name: Forest Jump
description: This Game Is Simple. Reach your destination only by jumping and running.

name: Level Up Boxing VR
description: Eye of the tiger is on us! Fight your way to the top! Boxing the boxes has never been so much fun!

name: Laruaville 8
description: Play Match 3 levels and build the town to turn anything into gold!

name: Skull Island: Rise of Kong - Colossal Edition
description: This edition includes 8 exclusive film grains featuring the ability to experience a red-tinted rage mode and the original look of the classic 1933 and 1970s era King Kong films, the Kong style pack with 8 different colors so you can choose-your-own Kong color, a boss-rush mode allowing you to defeat all the titans of Skull Island, and a behind-the-scenes exclusive pack including looks at in-game artwork and the all-original orchestral soundtrack.

name: Extraordinary: Soul
description: "Extraordinary: Soul" is a hand-drawn wind suspense story puzzle game, the story takes place in a shamanic legend of the town of Mutuso, you will follow a naughty robot Moe to investigate an unusual disappearance case.

name: Polygon Survival
description: Polygon Survival is a low-poly zombie survival shooter with simple building and crafting. You find yourself in a mini world of zombie apocalypse and your only goal here is survival.

name: Falling Down XR
description: Falling Down XR invites you to an immersive VR adventure. Our game is a compilation of several game genres. Choose what you like. Jump on moving platforms, find your way through a maze or unleash a hurricane fire on evil forces.

name: The Foretold: Exordium
description: Embark on an ancient Egyptian odyssey in this prequel to the gothic horror card game, The Foretold: Westmark Legacy. Build your deck, collect relics, and wield items to conquer creatures and bosses lurking in Egypt's shadows.

name: Running Fox
description: A sweet little indie game where you need to run with the little fox through a whole level of ups and downs. To complete the game, you need to collect all of the 100 gems. You may need to keep your eyes open to even find the hardest hideouts. Can you do so?

name: Corn Kidz 64
description: The unauthorized, kid-friendly version of the classic Stephen King thriller (or maybe not, maybe it's just a game about one-horned goatbabies)

name: Fly With The Yellow Crane
description: Soaring in the daytime, where are you going? This game will give a possibility. The night is long, and the road is full of branches. Good and evil are difficult to balance. Beauty is disaster or blessing? Regrets long live in the world. I can only imagine the utopia in the fairyland.

name: Silent Paws: Winter Quest
description: Embark on an enchanting journey with Silent Paws: Winter Quest, where the fate of a mystical world rests in your paws. As a cunning fox, you must venture forth into a breathtakingly immersive landscape teetering on the brink of eternal winter.

name: Manor of Mysteries
description: Manor of Mysteries is a horror-puzzle multiplayer game. Explore a manor full of randomized rooms! Solve puzzles, survive monsters, escape traps. Work with your friends to solve this manor's mysteries! Can you survive 100 rooms? Or will you be another lost victim to the manor?

name: Charon's Crossing
description: A mythological arcade-style game where you navigate Charon through the rivers of the Underworld. Dodge obstacles, confront adversaries, and strategize with Hermes' power-ups. Delve into a pixel-art world inspired by ancient legends.

name: Sonic Superstars: Digital Deluxe Edition featuring LEGO
description: Sonic Superstars Deluxe Edition featuring LEGO

name: Endless Dungeon: Last Wish Edition
description: Endless Dungeon is a unique blend of roguelite, tactical action, and tower defense set in the award-winning Endless Universe.

name: Pixel Colony
description: Build and manage your own colony. Citizens are primary resource. Protect your settlement and colonists from hostile environment and make a prosperous city.

name: Diablo IV: Season of Blood
description: Endless demons to slaughter. Deep customization through Talents, Skill Points, Runes, and Legendary loot. Randomized dungeons contained in a dynamic open world. Survive and conquer darkness—or succumb to the shadows.

name: Gord: Deluxe Edition
description: Gord is a dark-fantasy, adventure-strategy game set in a hostile land inspired by Slavic mythology. Besieged by vile creatures, you must build to survive. But to prevail, you must conquer the darkness beyond the gates. Command the Tribe of the Dawn and lead the conquest that will shape the kingdom.

name: Jolly Putt: Mini Golf & Arcade
description: The jolliest Mini Golf & Arcade Tycoon game! Design and Play your own courses. Manage arcade ticket prizes, food stalls, staff and much more to satisfy your park guest's every need. Customize, decorate and explore your park in first-person.

name: Mosa Lina
description: A hostile interpretation of the immersive sim, where nothing is planned, and everything works

name: Into the Inferno
description:
A retro-style first-person dungeon crawler RPG where you rescue kidnapped children from an underground demon horde.

Lead a party of four adventurers through the wilderness, a hostile Orc village, a town of violent Gnolls, and many levels of winding caverns and burning brimstone tunnels. Gather experience and equipment to improve your chances of defeating the demon horde to rescue the children and return them home where they belong. Help recover the remains of the lost miners to give their families closure, and eliminate the demon threat once and for all.

name: Card Age
description: "Card Age" is a casual, idle, God's perspective simulation management game. Survive and develop in an exquisite world composed of a variety of cards, gradually unlock new technologies, build industrial assembly lines and face various interesting challenges, and build your own Card Age.

name: Acres: Minimalist Farming Sim
description: Acres is a small strategy simulation game about growing crops for evolving market demands. Build a farm, one acre at a time, to create a prosperous enterprise. Upgrade equipment, optimize harvests, and nurture the soil against increasing time pressure. How long can you keep the farm operating?

name: Bumper Arena
description: Buckle up! Bumper Arena is a party game in which you drive a bumper car through a series of arenas featuring different mini-games. Bump and bounce your opponents off the walls, earn the most points during the round and try to win the game!

name: Death Ration: Back to 19XX
description: In Death Ration, You can confront the aliens to save the world, uncover the truth behind the spread of nanomachines and invasion, dedicate your remaining time to work for the community of refugees, transport supplies to camps using trucks, decorate your own house with furniture, the choice is yours.

name: Kosmo Azs
description: In 2033 in Russia, Vitaly is looking for a job to provide for his family. He is given a good chance to prove his ability to work and get an average paid job. Can he cope?

name: Halo Infinite: Season 5 - Reckoning
description:
An all-new Battle Pass featuring Flood-inspired rewards, new maps, a new mode, and a sophisticated AI Toolkit for Forge.

Coming later in Season 5, Firefight: King of the Hill offers a refreshing twist on the beloved co-op wave-survival mode.

Season 5 - Reckoning also brings with it multi-core helmets, Match XP in Custom Games, a new Mark VI reward for reaching Hero Rank, and more.

name: Skull Island: Rise of Kong
description: Embark on a 3rd person action-adventure quest to avenge the death of your parents at the hands of the ultimate alpha predator: Gaw. Conquer waves of primal beasts and defeat the minions of your arch-nemesis on your way to becoming the rightful King of Skull Island. Traverse the mysterious island and uncover lore and all the secrets the island has to offer as you encounter swamps, waterfalls, jungle, and skullite-filled caves that give the island’s flora and fauna its power.

name: Legend Creatures 2
description: Legend Creatures 2, sequel to the acclaimed strategy franchise created by the same solo dev, is a fun treat combining roguelike and auto battler gameplay. Recruit and evolve fantastical creatures with divine weapons to defeat the demon lord in the vast map. Modding support coming later!

name: Sweetcore Brews
description: Sweetcore Brews is an otome about a tea-brewing witch called “Milly”, whose dream is to open her own magical tea shop in the city. She is currently an apprentice witch working at an existing magical tea shop where the shopkeeper is rarely around. So Milly manages the shop full-time, practicing daily her new magical teas on her own by using them as solutions for her customers’ lives. She meets two love interests – Zero and Kingsley, both are also magical humans who run their own unique businesses. This game is a slice of life romance where Milly deals with the funny mistakes she makes from her magical teas causing problems, and she falls in love with Zero or Kingsley over time.

name: Dreaming Diorama
description: A unique casual puzzle game where you create a variety of dioramas. Explore and assemble dioramas in a 3D environment. Enjoy relaxing gameplay that allows you to create dioramas at your own pace with no time restraints.

name: Tennis On-Court
description: The ultimate VR Tennis simulator. Play with your friends or worldwide competitors in 1vs1 and 2vs2 online mode. Or practice in match against AI and various exercices. Physics has been worked with top players to transpose real tennis in VR.

name: Sonic Superstars
description: Adventure through the mystical Northstar Islands in this all-new take on classic 2D Sonic high-speed action platforming. Play as Sonic, Tails, Knuckles, and Amy Rose and harness all-new Emerald powers to move and attack in dynamic new ways. Navigate gorgeous, never-before-seen environments solo or with up to 3 other players and stop Dr. Eggman, Fang, and a mysterious new adversary from converting the islands' giant animals into Badniks before it's too late!

name: Calcium Contract
description: Calcium Contract is a fast-paced first-person shooter where you're on a mission to finish a contract that got out of hand. Learn to swiftly move around your enemies and master your arsenal as you fight your way toward the grand finale.

name: Stellar Serenity
description: Stellar Serenity is a relaxation game where you process materials and craft items in a spaceship. No pressure, no chance to fail.

name: Poems & Codes
description: Explore the wonderful world of poetry through deceptively simple substitution ciphers. 10% of every purchase benefits Project Gutenberg, an online library of over 60,000 free ebooks.

name: Outlive
description: Outlive is a first-person survival horror game, set in a post-apocalyptic world after a virus infected most of the population. You are determined to prove that the virus was not an accident, but rather planned and released by the government. You will go out on a journey to find the lab's and collect evidence. The only chance of survival is to use your speed and agility to outsmart your enemies, solve puzzles and make your way to safety after collecting all the evidence.

name: Short Staffed
description: In Short Staffed you are a server who has been tasked with bringing food to customers in a variety of different restaurants. Toss food across the room and jump over customers in this hectic couch co-op game.

name: The Editor
description:
Newspaper Editing Adventure.
"In 1996, a congressman was murdered...The prime suspect is a congressman's aide.
As the suspicious article was published the story begins"
Play the role of editor-in-chief of a newspaper.
You become the editor of a newspaper and write a front-page article every day.

name: Popcorn Rocket
description: Popcorn Rocket is a silly food based old-school arcade space shooter. Pilot the Popcorn Rocket as you blast through hordes of food spaceships in order to save the galaxy from the evil Nebula Empire! With a wacky cast of heroes and villains, Popcorn Rocket will leave your stomach wanting more!

name: Perry the Pumpkin
description: Perry the Pumpkin needs to save Halloween! In this epic platformer with RPG elements, you will learn secrets about the mayhem surrounding the spookiest of holidays. Perry will spit out pumpkin seeds to stop enemies and learn new abilities to help him with his mission.

name: Mortal Kombat: Onslaught
description:
Step into the visually-stunning and over-the-top world of Mortal Kombat through a brand-new RPG experience, filled with action-packed group battles! Mortal Kombat: Onslaught launches you into a new, mobile exclusive cinematic story where legends collide and unlikely alliances are forged. Join the fight today to stop a dark and dangerous villain from wreaking havoc across the realms.

For the first time in Mortal Kombat history, unleash total mayhem as you’re pitted against your foes in fast-paced RPG melee battles of up to 10 characters at once! Assemble the most powerful teams of experienced champions like Raiden, Liu Kang, and Scorpion to master your kombat skills and ensure your survival.

name: Vlad Circus: Descend Into Madness
description: Vlad Circus: Descend into Madness puts your sanity to the test, challenging you to escape a labyrinth of nightmares and torment. Test your mind against a slow burn of puzzles, light survival mechanics, and methodical action.

name: A Boy and His Blob: Retro Collection
description:
The Blob is back in an exclusive collection with Limited Run Games. The Retro Collection includes the original NES A Boy and His Blob: Trouble on Blobolonia, and The Rescue of Princess Blobette, originally on Game Boy.
Discover Blob's amazing appetite for jellybeans, and the different transformations that occur with each favor. Learn to use these shapes to overcome even the most outrageous obstacles.

name: Night Loops
description: A journey through the psyche. Escape your night shift at the hotel, explore dreamlike worlds, and lose your sense of Self while reliving the time before dawn in this dark, adventure / puzzle game.

name: Deios I: Director's Cut
description: Deios I is an arena shooter set in a surreal pixel art landscape. Players traverse through strange areas, challenging a series of arenas. Set in an alternative Internet world. The players uncover a mystery of what is the Deios BBS system invented by a strange interfaith cyber author. Themes of God.

name: Death or Glory
description: Death or Glory is a dueling card game where fighters compete in an arena. Defeat your opponent with ANY character imaginable with a unique deck embodying that fighting style. Unlock more and more cards to customize your deck on your journey to become the ultimate champion!

name: Wizard With a Gun
description: Wizard with a Gun is an online cooperative sandbox survival game set in a magical wilderness wrought with dangerous creatures and arcane mysteries. Embark on a journey alone or with friends to collect, craft, and outfit your wizard however you see fit as you explore the unknown.

name: Cyber Knights: Flashpoint
description: Cyber Knights is a tactical RPG in an original cyberpunk setting ten years in the making. Build your team of hackers, mercs and malcontents wisely; their stories will become interwoven with your own. Use powerful cyberware, shady connections, stealth, hacking and more to rise in the neon-soaked future.

name: Sumerians
description: Sumerians is a city building game set in ancient Mesopotamia. Attract new citizens and grow by expanding your irrigation system, building walls, temples and ziggurats. Manage your production, hire workers, and trade.

name: Hopping Up for It
description: A magician has stored a rabbit in his enchanted top hat. Inside the hat is a pocket dimension he uses for storage. But the rabbit can smell a bag of carrots outside... help the rabbit hop out, for freedom and carrots! As you hop ever-upwards in this challenging game, you can save any time.

name: Pandemonium: Infernal Bonds
description: Will old friends and new bonds be enough to save a Devil from his destiny?

name: Redash
description:
After Marsho lent his game to a friend awhile back, Mo won't give it back now!
It's up to you find the Warp Stars and take it back even if force is needed.

name: Vibrant World Adventure
description: The Vibrant World Adventure is a full conversion mod for Blade and Sorcery, utilizing HuJohner's Quest Framework to turn the game into a full-scale, RPG-style, open-world adventure with ~8 hours of gameplay content! This mod has a long list of mod requirements, ensuring that the player has plenty of places to see, people to meet, treasures to find, and mysteries to solve.

name: Phenix Corrupta
description:
You, Caroline Phenix, condemned to the depths of hell.
But why are you here? How did you die? Are you really dead? Will you ever see the light of day again?
Try escaping hell while slowly becoming a demon yourself!

name: Trail of the Wretched
description: Nobody said being a photographer was easy.

name: Super Mario Horizons
description: Mario wants to have a party, when mysteriously his friends disappear. Then Rokko-chan appears and tells him that it's not just them, but that lately people have been disappearing from different places. Mario together with Rokko-chan must solve the mystery and rescue his friends in an 8-world adventure, with bosses from different games.

name: Castaway of Steel
description: The player wakes up on an enigmatic island, where he finds a coliseum and people fighting. Nothing is what it seems, can you survive this adventure full of mysteries?

name: Hentai Girls: Definitive Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Bottle Can Float
description: Bottle Can Float is a relaxing casual game. In the game, you will select a bottle to go down the river. It will float freely along the flowing water. You can do You can influence the direction of the bottle by throwing small stones, and there are different small animals hidden in the river. You can make rafting more interesting by looking for these contents. I hope you can relax and have fun in the sound of gurgling water.

name: The Bourntyverse!
description:
Welcome to the Bourntyverse!

Explore the Bourntyverse, play games, and experience the joy of Bournty!

name: Hayven Celestia: Under One Sky
description: A lone hero must unite friend and foe in this Sci-fi Rock Opera Visual Novel

name: Dancing Duelists
description:
A 3-week game jam by the Mega Crit team to explore the Godot engine due to "recent events". It happens to coincide with Jump Ship Jam: https://itch.io/jam/jump-ship-jam ✨

A deckbuilding autobattler dance off with a BUMPIN' soundtrack

name: Realms of Alurya
description:
Synergy Land is an Action RPG game that integrates MOBA mechanics into a player-driven world that allows players real ownership of digital game assets, set in a fantasy world divided into four ecosystems: earth, water, fire and ice.

The player will take on the role of a hero, exploring dungeons and undertaking a great adventure against very powerful creatures.

​Inspired by popular games, such as Diablo and Albion Online, the game aims to combine the best of these worlds where regular and hardcore players will enjoy the gameplay experience as well as an ecosystem for players who want to collect and trade.

name: Farm Pets Bundle
description:
Farm DLC includes:
- 11 unique story orders!
- 11 farm properties in a unique environment!
- 5 empty plots for you to build on!
- 9 exciting mechanics, including the possibility of building extensions of your house!
- Over 1850 farm-themed items!
- 7 farm animals such as cows, sheep, chickens, and more!
- 6 animal products and 6 types of crop plants that you need to take care of!

name: Farm Bundle
description:
Handyman at your service!
You've got to earn it around here before you purchase your first property. No worries though! Luckily, there's plenty of work at your fingertips! Take job offers from nearby residents - clean up, paint walls, install heaters, showers, and air conditioners, or even furnish their whole property! Once the grateful clients pay you for your solid work, it's time to get your own house.

name: Jigsaw Puzzle Pack: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate Germany 2
description: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate, redefining digital puzzling.

name: Park Beyond: Beyond eXtreme - Theme World
description: Blaize’s career is skyrocketing and this calls for a mind-blowing celebration. Join her in creating a brand new festival park that is perfect for dare devils... Stuntwomen... and Adrenaline junkies!

name: D Laser
description: You are constantly flying from side to side and slowly climbing up. You turn every time you hit the sides of the screen. Your goal is to avoid being hit by the laser shooting from the top and take cover under the descending skydivers. Press a button to turn and hold a button to stay in place. If the laser hits you, it will push you down and you also descend slowly when you stay still.

name: Return to Northbury Grove
description: Return to Northbury Grove is a thrilling VR experience and love letter to the slasher horror genre. Centered around immersive escape room gameplay, players are tasked with evading the terrifying Slasher of Specter Forest. Can you survive a horror movie?

name: GoGoGo
description: This is a fast paced casual game.

name: Kwark
description: Kwark is a single player game about a creature that has to go through levels and then something impossible happens at the end! The game can be both from 1 person and from 3!

name: Everbee
description: This is a game about managing a beehive. Collect resources from flowers to raise bees and expand the hive!

name: Prezzies
description: A colorful retro style matching game. Squash Prezzies and match splatter colors before time runs out.

name: GunDeck 100
description: GunDeck 100 is a lightning-fast twin-stick shooter where you’ll build your arsenal from randomly-dealt cards. Weapons fire in a rainbow of elements with unique effects. Dart and dodge to survive the fireworks unleashed against you, and retaliate with your own display! Can you survive to wave 100?

name: Draft Day Sports: Pro Football 2024
description: Draft Day Sports: Pro Football 2024 puts you in the role of general manager of your favorite football team. Every decision can be made by you from drafting, trading, signing free agents right down to creating and calling your own plays to lead your team to championship glory and becoming a dynasty.

name: Aftermath
description: This is a shooting game!

name: Baby Time Simulator
description: Escape the busy daily grind and become a baby again! The ultimate game for recapturing the pure joy of babyhood that everyone has forgotten.

name: Blackhole on the Road
description: Blackhole on the Road is a thrilling game that puts you in control of a powerful black hole as you compete against others to become the largest and most powerful in the city.

name: Leave Panda Away
description: In China, there is a peaceful and beautiful country inhabited by pandas of various races. They are usually gentle and friendly, but when faced with threats, they will demonstrate strong combat effectiveness.

You have recently died in an accident, and you just want to go to paradise. But when you're sent to the depths of Hell, you can only do one thing: travel through the Nine Circles and state your case of innocence to Satan.

Everyone has been kind to you so far. Too kind, maybe. Especially the Keeper of Heresy, the Sixth Circle. In the confines of his space while an ash storm rages outside, the two of you pry each other open. But he might break you first.

name: Shadow Rebirth
description: Shadow Rebirth is a classic top-down ninja game with an exciting story, dungeon exploration, monster and ninja fights.

name: NFL Pro Era II
description: Show off your QB skills in the latest NFL-licensed VR experience, NFL Pro Era II. Suit up in the new multi-player where you and your friend, or a player from around the world, can compete online against each other. This year, it’s all about you. Are you built for it?

name: Soulstone of Hope
description: Embark on a heroic journey in this captivating fantasy turn-based JRPG. Choose your path as a fearless Warrior, cunning Rogue, or powerful Mage, each with unique abilities. Form unbreakable bonds with your companions and uncover the secrets of the forgotten catacombs.

name: Paraido
description: Paraido is a unique and relaxing puzzle game. Complete levels by moving and rotating hexagonal-shapes into their correct positions.

name: Zbuki Zoo Strategic Comedy
description: Humorous strategy with unique set of characters: buff genius, precious kung fu lady, half-ton puppy, cool spitter and much more. Plus some non-standard structures to build and quirky maps to explore. You can find these only in Zbukiland.

name: Vadi
description: Build your own kingdom in the dark valley where zombies rule and stay safe from zombies. It is up to you to survive in this valley.

name: XR22-Seaguard
description: XR22-Seaguard is a PC and VR game that reimagines the classic grid-based game of Battleship. This immersive PC and VR game puts you in the heart of a dynamic 3D industrial environment, where you'll strategically place and sink ships using state-of-the-art weapons and defenses.

name: Retris
description: A fresh take on the the falling block puzzle genre. Embrace imperfection with glitches and broken pieces to overcome this new challenge. Chase high scores or learn new techniques in a puzzle mode with over 50 handcrafted puzzles.

name: Balloons
description: Balloons is a single-player 2D racing game with roguelite elements. You can play as different emotive head balloons, breathe to gain lift, and enjoy fun and challenging tracks. The game has random map generation, different skill combinations. Win by reaching the finish line first.

name: Nine Realms: Revolt
description: A story driven deckbuilding adventure. Unlock 150+ cards from 5 factions as you try to save the realm. Combine up to 3 factions to create your own decks. Play units and spells to defend your 3 banners, and use dice to choose between reinforcing a lanes defenses, or empowering your units.

name: Simple Game
description: It is a simple game. Help Chibisi make a pie. Simply collect five apples and the victory is yours.

name: SuperPantsu Tentikun
description: A lewd game of tentacle pleasures.

name: ReThink | Evolved 5
description: ReThink | Evolved 5 is a Puzzle Game in a peaceful futuristic setting, that features a variety of Puzzles that utilize Lasers and the behavior of light and it's colors to create challenging problems to solve.

name: Elaria: The Corrupted Throne
description: In Elaria you journey through an open world filled with monsters, allies, and dungeons. Slay, loot, play cards, dungeon dive, and unravel the storied mysteries of a falling kingdom in this epic tale of action and adventure!

name: Windy Meadow: A Roadwarden Tale
description: Windy Meadow - A Roadwarden Tale is an interactive slice-of-life visual novel about choosing your own path. Help three protagonists make the most important choices of their lives. Featuring a multitude of hand-crafted characters and a richly detailed village set in the Roadwarden story world.

name: Growth
description:
Growth is a cozy, hex grid based soft-strategy game. Explore and populate a procedurally generated world by utilizing the unique abilities of animals. Growth blends the beauty of cozy exploration with challenging navigation around obstacles such as mountains and rivers to populate fertile soil, transforming barren landscapes into lush forests, meadows, and more. Experience an unforgettable mix of discovery and strategy. Start growing your own idyllic landscape!

Explore and expand an ever-growing, procedurally generated map by cleverly connecting clusters of wildlife. Claim newfound clusters or points of interest to receive additional wildlife or in some cases special rewards. As you expand the landscape you will discover new types of animals, providing unique abilities to overcome obstacles. Whether you're looking for a quick break from work or a relaxed puzzle session, Growths' intuitive gameplay lets you explore a beautiful landscape, tile by tile.

name: Empty Shell
description: Empty Shell will throw you in a dark industrial environment, a secret facility on a japanese island. Each volunteer has signed a contract for a "recovery operation" without being privy to too many details. A tense roguelite survival horror with a top down perspective.

name: Castillo: The Nine Circles
description: Embark on a journey through the nine circles of Hell, using unique abilities and weapons to defeat enemies and solve puzzles in this retro FPS inspired by 90's classics. Explore Dracula's origins on his quest to restore balance to the multiverse.

name: Paraopticon
description: Paraopticon is an Observation Duty / Puzzle Game Style mix. Try to spot all anomalies and report them so you don´t die.Make it till 6 AM and you survive.

name: Outpath
description:
An experimental clicker base building game.
Craft, gather & manage resources, base building, islands buy, exploit and expand!

name: Fantasy Office
description: "Fantasy Office" is a casual simulation PC game in which you become an apprentice civil servant of a community service center in a fantasy world that has developed like reality. Will Demini be able to successfully pass the various events in the community service center and become a civil servant?

name: Nuclear Option
description: Fly near-future aircraft with immersive physics on intense battlefields, facing land, air and sea threats. Wage war against AI or other players with an array of potent weapons. Wield tactical and strategic nuclear weapons, capable of annihilating anything in their path.

name: Tales of Aravorn: An Elven Marriage
description: In the first spin-off of the VN/RPG Loren The Amazon princess, play as Elenor or Saren again and travel to Triberg to make sure that the arranged elven marriage between Lydia and Marian goes smoothly. Be careful: the demons are planning something...

name: Wurmus
description: Endless snake-like game of tag

name: Revhead: Turbo
description: Turbo Pack DLC contains more than 60 new components, which gives high performance customisation to the game. It introduces twin turbo setups, intercoolers and additional air intakes to gain more horse power. Contents of this DLC allows the player to build cars with over 2000 horsepower!

name: Outlaw Cowboy
description: Welcome to Outlaw Cowboy, a thrilling simulation and strategy game that immerses you in the treacherous world of the American West. Set during the pioneering days of the Wild West, where the feverish gold rush attracted hordes of settlers, you will assume the role of a fearless bounty hunter. Your mission: conquer all that this lawless land has to offer.

name: One Skill
description: In this platformer you have 4 different skills but you can only use one at a time. Choose a skill to complete each of the sections across 4 levels.

name: Elly's Adventure
description:
Go on an adventure to get your toys back!

Elly and her best friend Natalie are children who love toys more than anything else. But when the diabolical engineer Chandra steals the girls' toys, it's up toe Elly to leap into action! Lead Elly through 20 wonderful stages to track down Chandra's army of robots and get your toys back!

name: Art Appreciation
description: Just another week at the museum for a friendly local connoisseur of beauty, who just so happens to be a ghost.

name: Fish Hooks
description: A collection of thoughts and poems and fragments about whose pieces I'm made of.

name: Soren Game
description: Soren Game is a dropping puzzle game like Suika Game. You can play on web browser. Players can score points by sticking together puzzle pieces in the shape of Soviet Union countries. The same piece can be put together into different pieces. There's a limit to the container you can put pieces in, and if it overflows, it's game over.

name: Witch's Bananas
description: Witch's Bananas is a physics-based platformer where you collect a witch's lost banana collection by jumping around in during a time limit.

name: SQP Run
description:
Take control of one of 8 unique characters and embark on a frantic race where speed and reflexes are king!

Your goal: cover as many meters as possible by skilfully avoiding obstacles in your way with the help of jumps and slides. As your score increases, the speed of the game accelerates, making each new challenge more intense.

If you're feeling cornered, quickly grab an energy drink for a life-saving burst of speed. But be careful, one wrong move and you're done!

Prove you're the fastest by checking the global leaderboard or challenging your friends directly. Who will be able to run farther than the others?

It's up to you to play the virtuosos of speed! A frenzied Runner where the pace is king and each new game is even more addictive. Ready to challenge your limits

name: Beast Mode: Night of the Werewolf Silver Bullet Edition
description: Unleash your inner beast, rack up epic kills, and dominate the leaderboards in this over-the-top Arcade Action spectacle!

name: Tech-Heresy
description: This is a heavily edited version of Technobabble Heresy, a map I made for the Radio Free Gehenna community project.

name: Ghost Catchers
description: It's Halloween night and your school got suddenly haunted by ghosts. Try finding them all and catching them!

name: UnderOneRoof
description: This is a 10 minute short story game adapted from real events. Players will follow the perspective of the female protagonist, click on items or move through the prompts of the scene and tags, and experience this unexpected family upheaval.

name: Arthur's Computer Adventure
description: Explore Marc Brown’s classic "Arthur’s Computer Adventure"! Arthur and his friends bring the story alive one word at a time, fully animated and voiced. Increase the challenge and the fun with an interactive at-your-own-pace option with lots of bonuses and secrets to discover!

name: Arthur's Reading Race
description: Arthur’s Reading Race centers around everyone’s favorite Aardvark. Arthur is trying to teach his little sister, D.W, to read. However, she insists that she already knows how!

name: Signal
description: Signal is a third-person adventure game full of unknowns and dangers, where the player takes on the role of a father searching for his daughter, facing extreme life and death decisions, the player must rise to the challenge of finding clues and solving puzzles in order to have a chance of survival.

name: Arthur's Birthday
description: Arthur's Birthday is adapted from the original storybook into an interactive animated adventure! Interact with the pictures and discover hidden scenes. Many surprising encounters await with your favorite Arthur storybook characters!

name: Parasomnum
description: Minimalist horror experience that offers 25-90 minutes of suspenseful gameplay as you try to escape from this unnerving reality.

name: Hidden Breaking Bed: Top-Down 3D
description: Find the objects that are hidden on the map.

name: Hidden World War II: Top-Down 3D
description: Find the objects that are hidden on the map.

name: Overpass 2: Deluxe Edition
description: Enjoy the ultimate off-road experience with the Deluxe edition, which includes additional content: a Polaris ATV, a Polaris UTV and a Rock Bouncer. Also get 4 experienced teammates to kick-start your career.

name: Hidden Space Top-Down 3D
description: Find the objects that are hidden on the map.

name: Mr. Semmel
description: Mister Semmel is a 2D platformer in which precision and speed are required. Can you manage to pass each level within the given time? Can you beat your own records?

name: Defense Cards
description: Defense Card is a very creative barrage shooting game. It combines the gameplay of barrage shooting and card use. It also has a random in-game growth mechanism, making it an addictive and fast-paced bullet hell game. curtain shooter

name: Utsuho's Great Hunger Battle
description: This is a Touhou fangame and Utsuho Reiuji is the main character.

name: Multishot
description: Multishot is a 2D Multiplayer Shooter Platformer Game. customize your character, change your cosmetic and fight! Take the top of the leaderboard!

name: Hot Wheels Unleashed 2: Turbocharged - Legendary Edition
description: Turbocharged - Legendary Edition and get the full game, Season Pass Vol. 1 and Vol. 2, and 8 vehicles.

name: Hot Wheels Unleashed 2: Turbocharged - Deluxe Edition
description: Turbocharged - Deluxe Edition and get the full game, Season Pass Vol. 1, and 4 vehicles!

name: Hot Wheels Unleashed 2: Turbocharged
description: The world’s raddest cars are back and taking the fun to the next level! Race over 130 vehicles with crazy new mechanics and even more vehicle types. Plus, build your tracks with stunning new environments and different game modes to have fun off and online!

name: Flock Party
description: Move your arms and body to stay aloft and avoid obstacles in this colorful, bird-brained VR racing adventure.

name: Brown Bob
description: Join Brown Bob in his thrilling adventure and help him save his beloved pet!

name: Prototype
description: PtAP have chosen you to be the new test prototype! What does it mean, you wonder? We will force you to fight against robots and other Prototypes like you, with Power-ups and Paintballs.

name: SquadBlast
description: In 2041, citizens worldwide take up arms to fight oppressive dictators and corporations to rebuild the crumbling world.

name: Tanuki Thief
description: Jump around as an agile tanuki and travel through the city to steal gold and treasure boxes.

name: Doki: Chapter 0
description: A Super Mario Bros. X2 episode by Doki containing a original cast of characters.

name: Milky Shaky Lab
description: Milky Shaky Lab is a telescope simulator for space explorers to discover celestial bodies, collect scientific stickers, test their knowledge, and collect unique albums.

name: Hardfest 2
description: Greetings mortals! Hardfest 2 is a community ﻿project for boom-compatible source ports that is focused on "hard maps" of any style, this time with a yellow theme! Featuring maps by 24 designers, there ﻿is a wide variety on offer, including large macroslaughter maps, tiny and precise combat puzzles, quiet exploration heavy maps & platforming maps. ﻿

name: Mew's Under The Truck
description: Thoughts on gaming rumours of the past.

name: Zobre Zombie
description: It is an old-style platform game, where our opportunities are few and the enemies outnumber us.

name: Cats Bundle
description: A bundle of six cat themed games on Nintendo Switch.

name: Mixx Island: Remix Plus - Complete Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Flap Legends
description: Become a flap legend

name: Giant Chase
description: Grow your sword to take down the Giant!

name: College Sex: Episode 2
description: A visual novel series about the sex lives of two college girls. In this episode, one of them tries to make the other jealous by hitting on her boyfriend.

name: Farm Land: Complete Edition
description:
Start your farming adventure! Take care of the plants, watch them grow and harvest the crops!
Your quest is simple... sow the seeds, harvest the crops, sell your products to the merchants and expand your farm to become the best farmer you can be!

name: Taxi Driver Simulator 2024
description: Taxi Driver Simulator 2024 is a type of taxi simulator. The player will play the role of a taxi driver who worked for so long that he became a millionaire. Now he works as a taxi driver for fun. The game has realistic graphics that give you the feeling of being in the scene where the action takes place. The game features a garage with luxury cars that the player can purchase after accumulating enough currency. The game has an open world and is intended for people loving simulator games.

name: Forwards
description: An experiential linear narrative walking sim.

name: The Soul of Too Birds Game
description: Destroy all art. Free the soul.

name: I Commissioned Some Cats 4
description: I paid artists to hide cats and wool in 15 pieces of artwork. Can you find them all? Warning: Relaxing.

name: Alta's Odyssey
description: Alta's Odyssey is a 2D Platform Adventure. After suffering the loss of his beloved rabbit, Alta travels on one final journey with his companion where together they explore the stages of grief through colorful and mysterious landscapes.

name: Cult of the Cat
description: Cult of the Cat is a highly playable placement and synthesis game that combines various gameplay methods such as synthesis, hang up, adventure, exploration, etc., coupled with super exciting activity content, it has been very enjoyable to play.

name: Energy Tanks
description: Fight for glory and bragging rights as you and another player face off to destroy shield generators and tanks in top-down battle arenas! Will you come out as the better tank?

name: Succubus: Sex Story
description: Welcome to the captivating world of Succubus Story – a unique visual novel with RPG elements that will immerse you in an exciting journey of passion and mysteries in a modern metropolis

name: We're Tethered Together
description: Cast into an ancient crypt, survive the horrors that dwell below, and ascend from despair with your unexpected companion in this 2D puzzle platformer. Take risks to evade the petrifying gaze from beyond the dark.

name: The Finnish War x Sotidrokhima: Finlandsaga
description: The heroes of Finland's past must come together to save the land from oblivion in the hands of the sorcerer, Louhi. The game is a non-canonical sequel to The Finnish War and Sotidrokhima, combining hack-n-slash and real-time strategy gameplay from the two titles.

name: Kitten's Head Football: Complete Edition
description:
This is exactly what you think, football with kittens, but not just that.
It’s not just a game about cutie kittens, they are real players, and you have to deal with them, because when these paws are on stadium - passion comes into play.

name: Captain Goose
description: Captain Goose is a shoot 'em up game in the style of naval battles and the golden age of piracy. Accuracy and precision calculation will help keep your ship afloat and ensure the success of your mission. The strongest will survive at sea!

name: Dungeon's Legion
description: It's time to rise up! When you're reincarnated into a fantasy world as the demon king, it's your duty to lead the demons and conquer the human world! Defend your dungeons from any adventurers who dare enter and attain victory by slaughtering your enemies!

name: R is for Rachel
description: A romance about falling in love for the first time, while suffering from social anxiety disorder.

name: Reliefs The Time of the Lemures
description: Reliefs is a first-person platform adventure puzzle game in a Mediterranean environment covered with Roman ruins left for centuries or indeed millennia.

name: The Legend of Zelda: Link's Initiation
description: Sin descripción

name: Holo no Suika
description: The game is played by synthesising various holomen to score points. There are currently 14 different modes, including past events.

name: 13th Friday Night: Funk Blood
description: Boyfriend and Girlfriend have decided to join up few campers for a camping trip, while hanging out by themselves they decided to have some fun, but unknown to them they have entered the forbidden territory and their presence has reawakened the dormant killer.

name: Zombie Go Remastered
description: Zombie GO is a puzzle turn-based game with more than 50 beautiful levels. You play as a man who survived the virus and must run away from zombies. On some levels, you must survive people.

name: Toiletisia vs. Evil
description:
Have you ever dreamed of playing a video game about a toilet who battles devil worshippers?

Then today's your lucky day!

This is a game about a beautiful toilet police officer who has to deal with an evil cult that summoned an ancient evil demon in a creepy mansion.

name: NPC Adventure: Post-Jam Edition
description: Play as Greg the shopkeeper in his journey to take down the king and be part of the knight's story with upgraded battle mechanics, foes to fight, and friends to talk to.

name: Minecraft: Annoying Difficulty
description: Minecraft: Annoying Difficulty is a mod developed by Fundy which adds a new difficulty option that makes the game more annoying to play.

name: Bingo Beavers: Halloween Decorations
description: Transform your Beaver Manor with enchanting Halloween decor! No new rooms, but every space brims with festive frights from whimsical witches to ghostly figures. A charmingly eerie adventure through each existing spot awaits!

name: Bingo Beavers
description: Build a cozy mansion for the beavers, play Bingo, and collect puzzles to unlock new daubers. With unique challenges and endless opportunities for fun, these games are perfect for any age and skill level.

name: Sport & Fun: Swimming - GOTY Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Another Earth
description: We make a highly enjoyable virtual world, where players have the opportunity to be creators, allowing them the tools and ability to expand the world, and create their own stories and meaningful experiences for other players in the evolving world.

name: Five Nights At Freddy's: Nightshift
description: The Gameplay Consists of a quick and smooth movement alongside responsive controls as well giving it some style in the game.

name: Synami's Speedmaps
description: 19 total speedmaps with minimal gameplay changes, such as making the pistol not entirely useless and buffs to the shotgun, chaingun and plasma rifle being present.

name: Cut the Rope 3
description:
Twelveth entry in Cut the Rope series. Cut the Rope is a series of physics-based puzzle video games developed by ZeptoLab for several platforms and devices.

Cut the Rope 3 focuses on Om Nom and his son, Nibble Nom setting out on a journey to discover new Nommies. The gameplay replaces pieces of candy with Nibble Nom, who must reach Om Nom's location in each level. The game features four locations, with the location that the player explores being selected by Om Nom's compass. In each search for a Nommie, the player will go through three random levels in order to take a picture of every new creature. It also features 3D graphics, similar to Cut the Rope Remastered.

name: The Lost Fear
description: "The Lost Fear" is a short 10-15 min psychological horror game about a nightmare. Solve puzzles and confront your fears to escape and wake up.

name: Dungeon Hunter 6
description:
Thrilling Gameloft ARPG Sequel!
Unite, fearless Bounty Hunters, and embrace Dungeon Hunter VI - a unique and enthralling hack-and-slash odyssey that continues the cherished saga. Enter uncharted territories, reunite with iconic characters, and experience a new level of excitement in this extraordinary installment!

Return to the Valenthia 200 years after the brave sacrifice of the Bounty Hunter and experience brand new thrilling adventures, in a scale never seen before in a Dungeon Hunter Game.

name: Ding Dong Dead
description: "A slasher horror game where the player's decisions matter. Babysit Rex, invite others, order pizza, survive the murderous Ripper, or give it to your dark side. The choices are yours."

name: Sakura Alien 1: Uchuu kara no Raihousha
description: An out-of-this-world new Sakura visual novel saga begins

name: Paw Patrol World: Aqua Pups - Costume Pack
description: Explore the world of PAW Patrol like never before and stop Mayor Humdinger's super blimp mayhem, in a free-roaming 3D adventure full of pup-tastic fun!

name: Paw Patrol World: The Mighty Movie - Costume Pack
description: Whizz around Adventure Bay and beyond saving the day in these heroic costumes from the Mighty Movie skin Pack.

name: Paw Patrol World: Ultimate Rescue - Costume Pack
description: Blaze a trail wearing the Ultimate Fire Rescue uniforms to give the PAW Patrol the fire-pup power to cool things down.

name: Paw Patrol World: Rescue Knights - Costume Pack
description: Transform your pups into Rescue Knights and get ready for action across Barkingburg, Adventure Bay, the Jungle, and Jake's Mountain.

name: Paw Patrol World: Halloween - Costume Pack
description: Help your PAWsome Pups turn into Halloween Heroes as they take on Humdinger's Mayhem with this ghostaclar skin pack.

name: Toonsters: Crossing Worlds
description: Travel the world and catch many Toonsters to build your team and become the biggest Toonsters collector!

name: Clan's Revenge
description: In 'Clan's Revenge, two young ninja train together, but one becomes a villain, triggering a confrontation between former friends in this visual novel full of shocking decisions.

name: Bullet Rodeo
description: Draw your weapon from the holster, keep your fingers near the trigger and prepare to fight merciless bandits!

name: Weedcraft Inc + Terraformers: Aim High Bundle
description: Get two strategy games in a bundle! Weedcraft Inc + Terraformers

name: Troublemaker: Raise Your Gang
description: Grab a backpack, boxing tape, and focus on what high school is all about: Beating the ever loving crap out of one another! Troublemaker blends favorite action-adventure-beat-'em-up elements from the strongest traditions in the genre.

name: Virtual Families 3: Our Country Home
description: Virtual Families 3: Our Country Home is a new way to play! Now a premium experience with no micro transactions to buy!

name: The Super Penguboy
description: Help little Super Penguboy overcome all the challenges in the Dark world!

name: U R Hell
description: A haunted computer simulator.

name: Moto Rush GT: Prime Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Submersible Simulator: Discover the Titanic into Ocean
description: Riddles of the deep sea await you. Become the number one underwater explorer!

name: Special Ops
description: Introducing the "Special Ops Trilogy" - an epic collection of three high-octane special forces games that will test your mettle and stealth skills to the limit.

name: Coloring Pixels: Halloween 5 Pack
description: This Halloween-themed book unlocks 20 additional levels for Coloring Pixels! Halloween is back for round 5 and it's just as spooktacular!

name: Romance Club: Stories I Play
description: Immerse yourself in romantic visual stories where you control what happens!

name: S.N.I.P.E.R.: Hunter Scope - Aniversary Edition
description: This bundle includes base game, Expansion Pack and Target Acquired.

name: Knights & Guns: Prime Edition
description:
This bundle includes base game, Expansion Pack #2 and Armor Pack #1 with:
- 10 new levels for you to bring back the peace
- 7 new armors to help you on your quest
- New enemies for that extra little kick

name: Friday the 13th RPG: A Fan Game
description: A fan project starring 13 playable characters in scenarios from the NES game and the first seven films.

name: Two Moon: Space Rabbit
description: I didn't know what you'd like, so I brought six weapons from Earth. The items are as similar to those on Earth as possible. So will you grow stronger for me, or will you defeat me? Whatever you choose, it will play out as I expect.

name: Hell Hunter: Anti-Nomen
description: A story driven adventure horror audiogame in which you have to interact with room elements, survive to environment gimmicks and fight real time battles based only on stereo audio. Learn the enemy patterns and hear where the attacks come from to dodge their attacks in time and then attack.

name: Age
description: This is a happy game.

name: Favela Zombie Shooter
description: Favela Zombie Shooter is a wave-based action shooter, where you have to defeat different types of zombies in a Brazilian Favela. Survive zombie waves, earn money and get better weapons to survive longer!

name: Polygon Fantasy Battle Simulator
description: Welcome to Polygon Fantasy Battle Simulator, the most colorful medieval fantasy battle simulator in existence! Throw tens of thousands of soldiers into battle, enjoy the show, or take direct control of one of them to prove your valor!

name: Mimic
description: Uncover the mystery of the MIMIC through a psychological horror experience with puzzles along the way.

name: Growers
description: Growers is a chaotic platformer multiplayer PvP game in which players compete with each other to reach the light on a dark map, to transform into a monster and devour the others. Be the last standing to win!

name: World League Baseball
description: Enjoy an excitement-filled baseball game rendered in a casual art style! Experience all the fun found only in ball games with simple and easy controls!

name: Shiba Simulator Supreme
description: Play as a dog (Shiba Inu) and save him from his nightmare. Explore a fever dream landscape to unlock different outfits and abilities. Climb the tower and achieve victory !

name: Possessions
description: You're trapped in a house cursed by a Kitsune and forced to play his game. Now you have to compete with other souls for control of a burglar's body in order to gain your freedom! As a stray soul try to ambush the burglar by possessing household objects! As the burglar finish tasks and find an exit!

name: Around the World: Travel to Brazil
description: AviGames presents the first game in the series "Around the World: Amazing Brazil". Go on a trip to the sights of Brazil, search for various objects, play exciting mini-games and collect souvenirs.

name: Ocean Pressure
description: Ocean Pressure is a singleplayer game where you as an old scientist piloting your handmade submarine in the bottom of the ocean. Your mission is explore the ocean and collect required data with help of your submarine.

name: The Chad
description: The evil Simp Co is turning everyone at Muscle Beach into Simps! Can you fight your way through all the simps and thots to find the source of the simp pandemic? We need your help Chad!

name: BUBG Single on the Ground
description: "BUBG: Single on the Ground" is an exciting and intense game that offers unforgettable experience.

name: SpeedRooms
description: A first-person platformer for beginners and experienced speed demons alike. Solving each room is a simple enough task, but to reach the top of the leaderboard you will need to prove your wit and tenacity.

name: Totum
description: "TOTUM" is a non-linear visual novel. In a conversation with eternity, the main thing is not to be crazier

name: Traumatarium
description: A randomly generated dungeon crawler in the style of Fighting Fantasy, featuring some of the most brutal 4 color dungeons!

name: Unexpected Consequences
description: Three years after tragedy struck twice, your new roommates reignite your desire for life, leading to unexpected revelations about your past and a long overdue reunion with one of your oldest and closest friends. Uncover the truth and choose your path to bring those responsible to justice.

name: Wet Girls
description: Wet Girls is the simplest 2D puzzle the final goal of which to give you pleasure!

name: Lost Recall
description: Puzzle game with the addition of skill-based elements. Move, push the objects, solve puzzles, and uncover new mechanics. Use unique abilities of the robots, which will allow you to unlock the next levels.

name: Bloxtacle Course
description: Bloxtacle Course is a block breaker game where you are given nearly full control over the ball itself.

name: Illuminate Frame
description: "Illuminate Frame" is a mouse-click-only simple puzzle game where you strategically place various tiles on the board to conduct electricity from power tiles to terminal tiles, aiming for high scores.

name: Sclera
description: Sclera is a Lovecraftian turn-based strategy roguelike set in a dying, near-futuristic world. Through menu-style combat, text exploration and skill-check events, maintain your sanity and manage resources as you gather a dark essence needed to survive the inescapable eldritch horror now hunting you.

name: Halloween World
description:
Immerse yourself in the pumpkin world and go in search of adventure to a place where there is always a spooky holiday!

But remember, even at the party, don't stray too far from the crowd. Who knows what might be waiting for you in a quiet and cozy corner...

name: Sud-Oh-Ku: Furry Playtime
description: "Sud-Oh-Ku Furry Playtime" blends erotic fantasies and Sudoku puzzles, immersing players in a captivating world of super horny furries. Solve puzzles, engage in seductive conversations and experience stimulating sexual intimacy with a colourful cast of furries in this enchanting indie game.

name: Subenishiki
description: This is a shooting action game in the style of Metroidvania. It is not a very complex maze, and the emphasis is on shooting combat. There are several types of weapons that can be used, and maintaining firepower is an important key to the strategy.

name: Budget Backrooms
description: Free, open-source low-budget single-player Backrooms game using Unreal Engine 4.

name: Degradation: Kyomu's Fury
description: Fight viruses, survive insane waves of rays and bullets, and find out more about the inhabitants of the Network in this mix of exploration and 3D bullet-hell/FPS game.

name: Shakabula
description: A South African urban legend called the Shakabula traps you in your house, could it be connected to your problematic past? You will need to find a way out of this horrendous curse. Creepy FMV+2D Art Atmosphere. "Steer" 'n Click + Metroidvania navigation system. JRPG + Twin-Stick Bullet Hell battles

name: Joy Life 2
description: In the game, you need to find two cards with the same picture and successfully eliminate them. If the flopped cards are inconsistent, there will be no change. The way to pass the level is to eliminate all the cards in the picture.

name: Escape Escape
description: You awaken in a mysterious room and promptly clear items from the desk. The individual behind this watches in surprise on the monitor. "Hey! What are you doing? Let me play my game!" "Escape Escape" is an adventure where you explore, interact, and advance through maps and characters.

name: Louma
description: Louma is a Roguelike Dungeon Crawler. Fight through the procedural generated floors and save the World of Louma.

name: Adrift in the Backrooms
description: Adrift in the Backrooms is a adventure multiplayer game that is a mix of backrooms games and more traditional co-op.

name: Glassbreakers: Champions of Moss
description: Lead your squad of Champions into an immersive arena in this exciting game of tactics, magic, and power! This 1v1 real-time battler puts you face to face with your opponent and their squad for action-packed gameplay that will keep you coming back for more.

name: Shoot For Fun's Sake
description: A short solo shooter game where you shoot fixed sensors and sensor patrols without anything shooting back. Use tactical skills to destroy sensors without exceeding the detection limit.

name: Nope Nope Nope Nope Nurses
description: The thrilling final installment of Dark One!'s hit visual novel series! Hapless protagonist Yamada is once again at the mercy of the tender depredations of the world's worst staff of nurses... and this time, it's up close and personal with the ruthless Head Nurse who dominates all the rest!

name: Manny's
description: A starving castaway on a deserted island discovers that a fast food restaurant appears once the sun goes down. As if beckoning him inside in his most desperate hour of need, this stranded soul will have to work for his meal...and for his life!

name: R00000
description: A home brewed 360° interactive horror flick. Witness a troubled soul craving to make a chilling home movie realize that the monster lies a lot deeper than he could have ever guessed. Play the cassette and rewind the terror hidden inside.

name: Noel the Mortal Fate: Season 3.5 - Revenger's Vacation
description: Caron proposes a seven-day vacation for Noel, who is exhausted from the battle. Noel, who is spending his vacation in an unfamiliar place, eventually decides to search for the owner of the "safe house".... Gather information as you explore the slums at your leisure and find the owner.

name: The Telephone
description: The Telephone is a first-person psychological horror game that will transport you to a world governed by anxiety. You will have to explore the house in which you are locked and the mysterious town of Lonely Plain, searching for clues that can help Roberta regain her memory.

name: The Grinch: Christmas Adventures
description: The Grinch has had a wonderful, awful idea – steal all the presents in Who-ville, using gadgets like his stealthy Santa costume and Candy Cane Lasso. Help him sneak around, freeze creatures with snowballs, and learn the meaning of Christmas along the way, in this festive platformer!

name: Fortnite: Transformers Pack
description:
Roll out, Rise up, or Beep Beep with the Fortnite Transformers Pack! Physical copies of this Pack will roll out at retail starting October 13, and digital copies will be available in digital stores starting October 21.

This new Pack includes:
- 3 New Outfits
- 3 New Back Blings
- 3 New Pickaxes
- 2 New Emotes
- 1,000 V-Bucks

name: Transformers: Earthspark - Expedition
description: Battle and explore as courageous Autobot, Bumblebee, in an exciting action adventure to stop his nemesis, Mandroid, from becoming the ultimate evil cyborg.

name: Hot Wheels Unleashed 2: Rust and Fast Pack
description: In the Rust and Fast Pack you will find nothing less than two legends like Mod Rod and the futuristic FusionBusta. Mod Rod combines a classic look with modern details, combining the best of both worlds for a result that is all style and energy, with its signature all-round windows that makes it even more badass. And when modern isn't enough, get behind the wheel of the futuristic FusionBusta and its super-powered engine, that takes the hot rods towards new horizons of evolution!

name: Technophobia: Do Androids go to Heaven?
description: "Technophobia: DAgtH" is a Narrative FPS Adventure where you're tasked with rescuing FESAC Engineers kidnapped by terroristic androids in a dark forest, all while discussing the ethics of using androids and AI in our daily lives. Is AI truly better than humans?

name: Lords of the Fallen: Deluxe Edition
description: A vast world awaits in all-new, dark fantasy action-RPG, Lords of the Fallen. As one of the fabled Dark Crusaders, embark on an epic quest to overthrow Adyr, the demon God.

name: Zombie Defense
description: A cooperative game for 4 players, you are a fighter of a special purpose unit, your task is to destroy waves of zombies by taking convenient positions and using tricks

name: Infinity Trials
description: Enter the Infinity Trials, an action-packed fast-paced rogue-lite. Fight off waves of dangerous creatures and collect artifacts to enhance your abilities. With each victory, you'll be teleported to a new world, each with unique challenges and enemies.

name: The Coffin of Andy and Leyley
description: In The Coffin of Andy and Leyley, you follow the story of Andrew and Ashley, siblings who have been quarantined in their house for months and are slowly starving to death. Everyone in the building appears to have contracted a contagious disease and are now locked in their apartments by armed guards. The guards do keep promising to bring food, but none ever comes, so eventually they have to resort to drastic measures.

name: Planet Surfer
description: Dodge Obstacles. Purchase upgrades. Save the world. Planet Surfer is a non-stop anti-gravity survival racer and the ultimate forward scrolling don’t run into stuff game developed as a love letter to the temple run quintet and the early 3d sonic games.

name: Fortune: Rewritten
description: Fortune: Rewritten is a PvP, or PvE experience! Battle in head-to-head combat where only one can be the winner!

name: A Quest That Became Legend
description: A Quest That Became Legend is a game inspired by old school RPG classics, with turn based combat and an open world environment. Set out on an epic quest to defeat the dark conjurers and save your world from destruction.

name: Hypogean
description: Welcome to the world of Hypogean, a casual mining simulation where you will be tasked with mining valuables for Hypogea, a mining corporation. Your main task is to operate a drilling machine and delve into the caves in search of ore, minerals, and other rare collectibles.

name: The Lab: Escape Room
description: Walk through a futuristic complex while solving puzzles and discover how you got there. What are this misterious creatures? Why everything looks abandoned? Could you escape from The Lab?

name: Skullfracture
description: Skullfracture is a tridimensional fighting game inspired by Smash Bros where you kick, punch and throw your way to victory by launching the opponent out of the ring!

name: Primal Threat
description: Blast cyborg dinosaurs and other dangerous creatures in this side-scrolling action/adventure! Explore an ancient labyrinth full of upgrades, weapons, and secrets to save the planet from a primal threat!

name: Chronotopia: Second Skin
description: Chronotopia: Second Skin is a unique rewriting of the Donkeyskin fairytale, a darker variation of Cinderella. Follow Kionna into a painful but ultimately rewarding search for her true self.

name: Submachine: Legacy
description: Submachine is a point and click adventure game. You will explore a network of interconnected rooms and solve puzzles with items you find along the way. This is a complete remaster of the entire Submachine series.

name: Lords of the Fallen
description: A vast world awaits in all-new, medieval dark fantasy action-RPG, Lords of the Fallen. As one of the fabled Dark Crusaders, embark on an epic quest to overthrow Adyr, the demon God.

name: Knight Hero 2 Revenge idle RPG
description:
Unleash non-stop battle in this 2D idle RPG adventure.

Knight Hero 2 Revenge offers a compelling fusion of role-playing and automated platforming in an incredibly addictive adventure game!

name: Game of Thrones: Legends
description: Winter is Coming in Game of Thrones: Legends free match 3 puzzle RPG. Assemble your team of Champions with characters from Game of Thrones and House of the Dragon! Collect Lord Jon Snow, Mother of Dragons Daenerys Targaryen, Tyrion Lannister, Rhaenyra Targaryen and more. Lead them to battle as you travel Westeros, where dragon games, fantasy, and strategy collide. The fight against the Long Night begins now in this free puzzle RPG.

name: Apartment 14-B
description:
Apartment 14-B is a short visual novel set in the same world as Kowloon's Curse.

Follow Fujimoto and Yukimura, two D.I.M.S. agents, as they solve the case of a man who was found dead in his apartment.

Gather evidence, interview suspects, and solve the mystery of Apartment 14-B.

name: Shin Megami Tensei VX
description: A previously japanese-only fan remake of the first Shin Megami Tensei made in RPG Maker VX and translated into english by TeaTimeSpooks. Includes all new routes, altered gameplay, new demons, and more. .

name: Cat Sandbox
description: Save pixel cats in this physics puzzle game!

name: Oratorio
description:
Oratorio is a rhythm action rail-shooter developed for the 8-bit Nintendo Entertainment System.

Primarily inspired by games like Rez, Child of Eden, and Thumper. Oratorio is a unique on-rails rhythmic shooter where players create the music of the game through interaction with the game's systems, like shooting enemies, projectiles, and powerups. Everything players do contributes to the soundscape in this innovative retro music shooting game.

The game takes place in a dystopian cyberpunk future where an environmentalist hacker group launches a desperate mission to hack the servers of one of the world's largest corporations in order to steal the DNA sequences for extinct plants and animals that the corporation has copyrighted for use in virtual reality safaris. As the enigmatic hacker named Oratorio, players are the last hope for revival in a world that has gone to a digital ruin.

Players control a cursor and assume a first-person perspective on an ever-expanding digital track in cyberspace.

name: Animal Arena
description: Animal Arena is a wacky local multiplayer battle game for 1-4 players featuring cute animals and simple one button controls. Fight across unique arenas, collect weapon power-ups, and stomp opponents to win! Earn points by battling to unlock more playable animals!

name: Need for Speed Unbound: Volkswagen Beetle (1963) - Legendary Custom Pack
description: Be notorious & show people why you're at the top of the scene in the Legendary Custom Volkswagen Beetle (1963). Alongside the ride, enjoy a 10-level Speed Pass boost.

name: Need for Speed Unbound: Trick or Street Swag Pack
description: Make an entrance with the new Trick or Street Swag Pack, containing a one-off Legendary Custom clothing pack inspired by the golden age of American animation, a Skeleton Head mask, a driving effect, & more.

name: Need for Speed Unbound: Vol.5 Customs Pack
description: Pack your Garage with 3 new, exclusive Custom Builds: Chevrolet Corvette Grand Sport (2017), BMW i8 Coupé (2018), & Mercedes-AMG C 63 Coupe (2018).

name: Star Trek: Infinite - Designing the Galaxy
description: Like many crews before us, we have documented our voyage for posterity. Explore the birth of Star Trek: Infinite from concept to completion with a 70-page artbook!

name: From Space: Mission Pack - Concrete Jungle
description: Mission Pack: Concrete Jungle is a DLC for From Space that will take your Horde Mode experience to the next level. Ramp up your gameplay with the addition of 2 new maps (Skyline and Hospital), a weapon (Medic Gun), 2 items (Decoy Soldier and Ice Maker), and a perk (Resurrection Perk).

name: From Space: Mission Pack - Molten Iron
description: Mission Pack: Molten Iron is a DLC for From Space that will take your Horde Mode experience to the next level. Ramp up your gameplay with the addition of 2 new maps (Crucible and Steelworks), a weapon (Plasma Shotgun), 2 items (Bear Trap and Napalm Mine), and a perk (Protective Coveralls).

name: Turn-Based Bundle
description: Including five turn-based strategy games published by Goblinz!

name: Ultimate Jigsaw Puzzle Collection
description: Enjoy 600+ unique jigsaw puzzles across 5 different games. Experience high-quality images from various themes, such as: Nature, Art, Cities, Animals and so much more!

name: Buddy Canine Ballcaster
description: In this platform game, you control Buddy, a ball-throwing dog who must rescue his brother from the evil goblin king and his minions.

name: The Legend of Shadow: Mask of the Force
description: Shadow action to collect the masks of power and take vengeance on the gods. Use the power of many masks of special skills to get stronger! Enjoy stylish shadow action!

name: Dragon Ball: Xenoverse 2: Special Edition
description:
The Special Edition includes:
• Dragon Ball: Xenoverse 2
• Super Pass
- Super Pack 1
- Super Pack 2
- Super Pack 3
- Super Pack 4
- Super Pass Bonus: Early access to the character Future Trunks from DRAGON BALL SUPER.
• HERO OF JUSTICE Pack Set
- HERO OF JUSTICE Pack 1
- HERO OF JUSTICE Pack 2

name: Pinball FX: Williams Pinball Volume 7
description: Dive into breathtaking adventures on three of the greatest Williams classics!

name: Paint-a'-Way
description: Paint-a'-Way is a platformer game where you use your brush to paint your way across different obstacles while avoiding the black skunky oil that lies in your way. Make your way to a colorful rift to continue your journey across yodie land.

name: Crossout: Sky Raiders
description: Crossout goes up in the air! Join the “Sky Raiders” season, unlock all new parts, assemble the flying armoured vehicle of your dreams and battle other survivors in new locations!

name: Japan Train Models: JR East Edition
description: Build, view, and run realistic reproductions of trains in your own railway space! Japan Train Models is a model train puzzle and layout crafting game for model train fans that allows you to create "Train Models" and "Scenery" just like a puzzle.

name: Arcade Archives: Guttang Gottong
description: A fun railway trip!

name: Moving Out 2: Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Hunt: Showdown 1896 - Souls of a Feather
description: This DLC contains one Legendary Hunter with two variations, two Legendary Weapons, and one Legendary consumable: Scourge: Morrigan (Hunter), Scourge: Midian (Hunter), Wing's Wake (Winfield 1893 Slate Riposte), Heart's Dowry (LeMat Mark II UpperMat), Cagebreaker (Sticky Bomb).

name: Steampunk Jigsaw Puzzles: Mediterranean City-States
description: It is often remarked that the balmy lands around the Mediterranean are living through a second renaissance. The spirit of Galileo certainly seems to endure, in this new era of mechanical and architectural splendour.

name: Pinball FX: South Park Pinball
description: It’s South Park, pinball style! Join Cartman, Stan, Kyle, Kenny and Butters in these totally sweet pinball adventures!

name: Mistward
description: Mistward is a survival city-builder set on a mysterious island enshrouded in a poisonous mist! Create light sources to keep the mist at bay, build houses and command humans to gather resources. Explore the island and find a way out!

name: Trapped in The Tricky Prison
description: The prison is full of tricks. Seek many rooms to find cues for getaway. Can you get out?

name: Fights in Tight Spaces: Complete Edition
description: Fights in Tight Spaces: Complete Edition

name: Escape from Death
description: "Escape from Death" is a 256,000-word interactive horror adventure novel by Tova Näslund. It's entirely text-based—without graphics or sound effects—and fueled by the vast, unstoppable power of your imagination.

name: Break the Glass Cup: Breaking Physics Puzzle
description: A classic mindfulness and accuracy puzzle based on real physics - throw the ball and break all the glass cups!

name: Dementium: The Ward
description:
Dementium: The Ward, an atmospheric retro horror FPS returns. Be adraid.

The award winning survival horror experience returns from the dead. Built from the ground up for Nintendo Switch, Dementium: The Ward combines smooth first-person shooter gameplay with a demented tale of mystery and terror.

name: Big Vehicle Simulator Games Bundle: Truck Farming Flight Construction Bus Ship
description: This bundle includes 6 games: Bus Driving Simulator 22, Farmer Sim, Flight Sim 2019, Extreme Trucks Simulator, Ship Simulator, Truck Simulator USA. Bus Driving Simulator 22 Get behind the wheel and become a professional bus driver!

name: Car Games Bundle: Racing Driving School Police Drag Drift Taxi
description: Get behind the wheel of your favorite cars and become the best driver in the world!

name: Corrupted Universe Cries Quietly
description: Roguelike survival game that focuses on combat and exploration. Have Fun!

name: Elemental Mage Defense
description: Step into "Elemental Mage Defense", a dynamic realm where magic meets valiant heroism. As a mage, you'll defend your homeland through strategic battles, unfolding narratives, and thrilling expansions. Every choice carves your legacy.

name: Edmund Puzzle and The Mystery of the Sacred Relics
description: Mystery. Adventure. Time travel. Get ready to embark on an epic adventure through time and space in Edmund Puzzle and the Mysteries of the Sacred Relics. In a world full of dangers and mysteries, every minute counts to save humanity from a mysterious and extremely dangerous enemy.

name: King of the Times
description: This is a casual and fun game with a cute cartoon style.

name: Subpar Pool
description: A whimsical adventure of playful pocket antics at the intersection of golf and pool, from the developer behind holedown, twofold inc & rymdkapsel.

name: Welcome, Get Out!
description: "Welcome, Get Out!" is a puzzle game where the cranky narrator really doesn't like you being there. It is a Point&Click comedy adventure that will take you through 7 different hand-crafted levels against the wishes of the sarcastic narrator who is trying to stop you from succeeding.

name: Lost Kingdom
description: "Lost Kingdom" is a unique action adventure big open world 2D platform jumping game, as an epic game, it has different characteristics, jumping feel is its most distinctive feature, traveler ah, go quickly to the mysterious kingdom, where there are magical and ancient secrets waiting for you!

name: Polygon Arena
description: Polygon Arena is a PvP Third Person Shooter game with 6 Weapon types and 2 game modes. Host or Join matches and aim for the highest score!

name: Tropico 6: Going Viral
description: In Tropico 6's Going Viral DLC, the health and prosperity of your nation hang in the balance as contagious diseases sweep through your island paradise.

name: Flex Disc Golf
