description: Play countless disc golf courses throughout the world, find lost discs or buy new ones, and learn new throws and styles! Experience realistic gameplay while being surrounded by highly detailed nature.

name: Sonny The Mad Man: Casual Arcade Shooter
description: Welcome to Sonny The Mad Man! Are you ready for adventure and epic fights?

name: The Forgotten Village of Gondomayit
description: Kinan, a Yogyakarta native, became a civil servant and was posted to Gondomayit Village in remote Central Java. Here, electricity is scarce, and locals depend on traditional lighting. Evenings are quiet due to the lack of illumination.

name: Alphadia I & II
description: The legends of energi once again in a new edition! Step into the enchanting world of Alphadia, a revitalized epic fantasy RPG series that merges the first two titles, 'Alphadia I' and 'Alphadia II', into a single, captivating adventure.

name: Survival Quiz City: Festival Edition
description:
A new free-to-play version of Survival Quiz City on the Nintendo Switch in Japan and releasing as a new app on Steam without English support, the original Steam release will be shutdown. The game will still have the same game systems as the original along with the new city festival, including various themed events

Player data from the original release on Steam can be transferred starting October 1st until it is shutdown on October 31st and will include some some bonus draw tickets in the new game but it is set to be in Japanese only.

name: Poly Match
description: Challenge yourself inside a polysphere world! It is the best choice to spend your time. Playstyles and moves are rendered in-game with meticulous attention to detail. Simple and fun for all ages. Get a completely new experience and relax your mind with 3d puzzle!

name: Hotel: Lake Edition
description: The Lake Edition adds an additional resort location: an idyllic lake and the surrounding forest. A true haven of tranquillity, it's an ideal place to build a hotel for holidaymakers seeking nature and the great outdoors.

name: Duckball
description: Duckball is an action-packed battle royale game where up to 100 players compete to be the last duck standing. Play with friends online and collect wacky items to knock your opponents off the stage in an ever changing 3D environment. Do you have what it takes to be truly glorious?

name: Stormworks: Space
description: Stormworks: Space is the space mechanics and moon location expansion for Stormworks. This expansion includes the vacuum of space, the moon, and all new space-grade components and equipment.

name: Summon
description: I wonder who's knocking there?

name: Deep Maze
description: Experience the game from a top-down perspective that allows you to delve into the heart of the mountain range, measuring your progress against the speed. Now, let's see how far you can go. Let's find out!

name: Echoes of Numa
description: Jessabel is the guardian of the next Vessel, Allegra. Responsible for training her, she'll soon find out that there is more to Allegra than she could have ever imagined. This 1 Vessel has the power to change everything. It's Jessabel's duty to make sure Allegra does well. For the sake of humankind.

name: Kittengumi: The Sakabato's Thief
description: Kittengumi: The Sakabato Thief transports us to an alternative Japan (Gapon) where its protagonists, a cat and a panda who thinks he is a cat, will have to recover one of the treasures of the Kittengumi -a group of samurai cats that watches over the security of the city of Nyedo.

name: Haunted House
description: Creep, sneak, and dash your way through hordes of ghouls and eerie ectoplasms in this roguelite reimagining of the classic Atari adventure!

name: Mtn Chaos
description: Conquer treacherous mountain terrain in Mtn Chaos! Drive powerful off-road vehicles, jump ramps, dodge obstacles, and customize your ride. Experience intense racing and thrilling challenges in this adrenaline-fueled off-road adventure!

name: Dino Ranch: Ride to the Rescue
description: Grab your hat and your lasso, it’s time to ride into a Dino-rrific adventure to save the Cassidy Ranch!

name: Turn on the Light: Jigsaw
description: A minimalist game about connecting circuits, solving jigsaw puzzles and mind-bending recursive circuits.

name: Saltsea Chronicles
description: It begins with a kidnapped captain and a stolen ship. Where it leads next? That’s up to you… In this story-driven adventure game you will explore strange and wonderful communities, uncover a deep conspiracy, and chart a journey through twists and turns, difficulties and delights.

name: Star Trek: Infinite
description: Star Trek: Infinite is a grand strategy experience that lets you play your own Star Trek story as the leader of one of four major factions in the galaxy. Follow the specially crafted story or blaze your own trail in the first Star Trek grand strategy game.

name: Shadows of Duat
description: An old school survival horror set in Egypt. An indie game with the essence of the classics of the genre, with realistic graphics and immersive sound. A difficult and terrifying challenge only suitable for the bravest people. No one will hear your screams from inside the grave.

name: Astrosmash
description: Astrosmash was originally a Shoot´em up game for the Intellivision console in 1981. This reimagined version is based on the game’s original theme and gameplay but much more exciting and challenging. The new graphics are phenomenal and the amazing background music adds a lot of excitement.

name: Samba de Amigo: Virtual Party
description:
It's time to shake it on center stage in this vibrant rhythm action game. Join Amigo and his friends in an all-new Samba de Amigo, now in VR.
Pick up your maracas and groove to over 40 hit songs from the world's most popular genres, with even more arriving as post-launch DLC!

Feeling confident in your skills? Complete the StreamiGo! challenges to help Amigo rise to fame.
Strut that style by customizing your character with unique costumes and accessories.
Show the world what you've got by competing on the online leaderboards.

name: Fragile Feelings
description: A sweet, slow burn yuri / lesbian visual novel about an anxious young teacher being swept off her feet by the cool, competent school nurse.

name: Elrentaros Wanderings
description: The dual life where Fantasy meets Reality begins! A brand-new action RPG, Elrentaros Wanderings!

name: WTC: Love's Labour's Lost
description: The Violet Hotel's waitress and local tour guide are determined to foil the protagonist's plans to take Grendel back to America. Unfortunately, neither native is prepared for the cost of doing so

name: Tales of Autumn
description: A wild farming RPG with an emphasis on animals and terrain management. Develop the abandoned ranch, befriend the wildlife, build relationships and earn the trust of the town

name: Sinoepoch
description: Sinoepoch is a grand strategy game based on the historical fantasy of the Three Kingdoms period in Chinese history. In the current version, players can create their character, "travel" to the end of the Eastern Han Dynasty,create their family legends.

name: Grow Up! A Worm Game
description: Worms... Worms! What are worms? Is this... A worm? Do worms really come from space? Only one way to find out! Get your hands ready for this challenging, perhaps tear inducing, humorous 2D precision speed game!

name: Hotel Life: A Resort Simulator
description: You are the manager of a hotel in an idyllic location. Build, design and develop your hotel, while creating unforgettable memories for your guests through expert management and by offering exceptional entertainment.

name: VRekken
description: VRekken is a physics driven beat 'em up and self-defense trainer built for VR. You can use your punches, melee weapons (and kicks if you have 2 additional trackers) to beat up the bad guys. If you have been learning martial arts you can use your skills to your advantage.

name: Tribe: Primitive Builder
description: Imagine that you don't have any modern technology. Use your mind to build from scratch your first primitive tools and constructions.

name: Classic Games
description: Introducing the "Classic Sports Extravaganza" - a triumphant collection of three universally beloved games that have been cherished around the globe for generations: Bowling, Table Tennis, and Darts.

name: Drums Rock: The Offspring - 'You’re Gonna Go Far, Kid'
description: Get the track 'You’re Gonna Go Far, Kid' from The Offspring! This track is part of the 'Legendary Mix Vol. 1'.

name: Drums Rock: Spacehog - 'In the Meantime'
description: Get the track 'In the Meantime' from Spacehog! This track is part of the 'Legendary Mix Vol. 1'.

name: Drums Rock: Lit - 'My Own Worst Enemy'
description: Get the track 'My Own Worst Enemy' from Lit! This track is part of the 'Legendary Mix Vol. 1'.

name: Drums Rock: Collective Soul - 'Shine'
description: Get the track 'Shine' from Collective Soul! This track is part of the 'Legendary Mix Vol. 1'.

name: Danganronpa Dreamland: Hymn of the Sea and Whales
description: The premise is as usual 15 students trapped in a school, Hope Peak Academy....or is it?

name: 3x9 Kingdom: Road of Adventures
description:
Playing as Oleg or Olga, you will go on an exciting journey into a 3x9 Kingdom to help the kids return home.

During the story, you will meet many characters of Russian folklore, such as The Gorynych Snake, Baba Yaga, The Mermaid, Chernomor, and many others. Some creatures will need your help, while others will try their best to keep the kids in the 3x9 Kingdom.

name: The Good Weapon
description:
The world is consumed by evil, leaving the three of you trapped inside your bunker. There's no way out other than to nuke the entire world.

Yet your leader's having second thoughts. She's getting cold feet; and if the two of you can't convince her to use the weapon, then maybe it's time to take matters into your own hands.

Are you ready to save the world?

name: Doku to Kuzu
description:
When I got home, I found a woman's shoes at the entrance.
This is something that it's not supposed to be in this house where only my father and I live.
As expected, when I went to the living room, my father and a woman I didn't know were drinking alcohol.
My father, who is an extremely lazy and useless person, who I both hate and love.

A visual novel about the toxic family relationship between a father and his son.

name: PUBG: Battlegrounds - Season 26
description: A new challenging Season of Ranked – Season 26 has arrived with this update.

name: Aqua Romance: Mermaid Otome
description:
Presented by Storytaco and ENP Games, "Aqua Romance" is a unique high-level romance otome game.
It is a modern fantasy interactive choice game where you can immerse yourself in an enchanting universe filled with thrilling twists.
Write your own romance story in "Aqua Romance"!
(Note: Every choice you make changes the fate of the characters.)

name: Pocket Player Pro: Mega Man
description:
This officially licensed title includes Mega Man 1-6!

Mega Man is the iconic blue bomber who has been delighting fans for over 30 years. Mega Man is one of the most popular video game franchises of all time. The Mega Man series has sold over 38 million units worldwide. With his ability to absorb the powers of his enemies, Mega Man is a force to be reckoned with.

Battle your way through challenging levels, defeat powerful bosses, and save the world from Dr. Wily's evil plans.

name: Comic Coloring Book: Complete Edition - Colors Special
description: Sin descripción

name: Pixel Paint 2: Definitive Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Lyssa: Goddess of Rage
description: Various battlefields with random obstacles and different heroes with unique bonuses to hone your strategy skills. Explore the map, defeat powerful bosses, build your story line, accept quests and embark on a journey! Assemble your forces and lead your party to Victory!

name: Age of Empires II: Definitive Edition - The Mountain Royals
description: Prepare to embark on a legendary journey as we introduce the "The Mountain Royals" DLC for Age of Empires II: Definitive Edition. Unlock the rich history and untold stories of the Armenians and Georgians, part of three new campaigns!

name: Obzen
description: OBZEN is a set of 32 limit removing CL4 maps for the Plutonia IWAD. These are short maps with low monster counts (100 or less, unless playing co-op) with a heavy emphasis on high difficulty, evil traps, and hard fights.

name: Water & Domestic Animals Bundle
description:
Create and observe Aqua World! Learn more about fish and their behavior and take responsibility for their lives. Control the temperature, environment, and nourishment to provide a suitable environment. Don’t forget to develop your aquarium and after a while, you will be able to open an aquarist shop!

Animal Shelter Simulator grants you the opportunity to tackle the challenging but also highly rewarding task of running a refuge for strays and rescues. Witness firsthand how much effort goes into helping abandoned and injured animals as you handle a number of tasks necessary for your shelter to operate smoothly.

name: Oceanic Discoveries Duo
description:
Aquarist:
Create and observe Aqua World! Learn more about fish and their behavior and take responsibility for their lives. Control the temperature, environment, and nourishment to provide a suitable environment. Don’t forget to develop your aquarium and after a while, you will be able to open an aquarist shop!

Ship Graveyard Simulator:
Visit the largest ship graveyard in the world. A dozen kilometers of beach filled with wrecks. Hundreds of ships wrecked on the coast. Thousands of tons of steel. Choose the most valuable ship for you and start the adventure. Play as one of the workers during the most dangerous work in the world. Cut, hit, weld! Dismantle the whole ship and sell the obtained parts and upgrade your equipment.

name: Waters & Fields Adventure Bundle
description:
Create and observe Aqua World! Learn more about fish and their behavior and take responsibility for their lives. Control the temperature, environment, and nourishment to provide a suitable environment. Don’t forget to develop your aquarium and after a while, you will be able to open an aquarist shop!

Get ready for a logistic challenge in the next part of the best-selling series, which has been sold in over 120,000 copies! In Farm Manager 2022, as a farm manager, you have to ensure the right level of harvest, employee satisfaction, animal health, equipment efficiency and proper crop processing. You can buy new plots and use materials from abandoned buildings to expand your farm. Thanks to the new, more intuitive interface, employee management is even simpler.

name: Underwater and Seafaring Duo
description:
Create and observe Aqua World! Learn more about fish and their behavior and take responsibility for their lives. Control the temperature, environment, and nourishment to provide a suitable environment. Don’t forget to develop your aquarium and after a while, you will be able to open an aquarist shop!

Take control over 3 special purpose naval vessels. Complete various missions on dangerous waters of Baltic Sea.
Take part in recovery of objects from the bottom of the sea. Transport heavy cargo to its final destination, also including rescue and transport missions. Assemble massive naval installations on open waters.

name: Aquatic Pursuits Bundle
description:
Fishing Adventure is a typical fishing game, where the player can (drums) catch different fish species! Fish in USA, Hawaii and other unique fisheries.
Game is quite simple, designed to run even at older computers!

Aquarist:
Create and observe Aqua World! Learn more about fish and their behavior and take responsibility for their lives. Control the temperature, environment, and nourishment to provide a suitable environment. Don’t forget to develop your aquarium and after a while, you will be able to open an aquarist shop!

name: Big Klondike: Spider Solitaire
description: Support Big Klondike and unlock Spider Solitaire.

name: Word Space
description: Guess the word before you lose all the petals from the sunflower. Go through 50+ levels and complete them all to learn new words and phrases.

name: Supreme Car Parking Simulator 2024
description: At the disposal of the player there is a garage with different cars, which he can acquire during the game. The player has to complete many missions.

name: Crate Escape
description: Crate Escape is a simple 2D platformer where you help a disembodied skull navigate strange dungeons using crates to solve puzzles. See how fast you can beat each of the 50 levels and collect all the golden crates hidden within them.

name: Fruit Conflict
description: The game consists of many worlds, your goal is to progress and get all the skins and profile pictures or you can even play 1v1 with your friend.

name: Fallen Ninja
description: Lord Mordenai has captured Treasure. Ninja warrior mission is to kill Mordenai and steal Treasure Chests back

name: Theatrhythm: FBL - Bravely Default Pack
description: A pack of additional music tracks to use with Theatrhythm Final Bar Line.

name: Honkai: Star Rail - Jolted Awake From a Winter Dream
description:
Version 1.4 of Honkai: Star Rail, featuring:
• New characters: Jingliu, Topaz & Numby and Guinaifen
• New main story quest
• New areas: Old Weapon Testing Ground and Pillars of Creation
• New companion missions
• New main event: Aetherium Wars
• …and more!

name: Carball 360
description: A game of carball where the last team to touch the ball scores the goal. An AI named Vicky is there to fill the void when friends are unavailable. Light, simple, competitive.

name: Neon Marble Rust
description: Play as one of 3 Houses: Neon, Marble, or Rust! Each faction is completely unique: buildings, units, even resources are unique to each House. A two-state rollback system ensures smooth online gameplay, while a mix of challenging mechanics and automation allow you to play (and win) how you want!

name: Don't Fall
description: Climb higher and higher in “Don’t Fall”! Face daring challenges, explore a world filled with secrets, and reach incredible heights. The sky is your limit!

name: Save the Dungeon!
description: Save the Dungeon! Is a tower defense game from the perspective of the villain. Upgrade your minions to hold back the relentless hordes of heroes.

name: GallowsHill
description: GallowsHill is a test of wit. A unique falling block puzzle, you command cells, aligning color and frame to trigger effects. Your goal? Erase the star and claim victory. GallowsHill is a battlefield for thinkers, a challenge of intellect. Are you ready to carve your path of victory?

name: RedRaptor
description: Blast off for a retro arcade experience in RedRaptor, a vertical shoot’em up inspired by genre classics of the ’90s!

name: Mercenaries Saga 3: Gray Wolves of War
description: “Mercenaries Saga 3: Gray Wolves of War” is a tactical simulation RPG set in a fantasy background. It is the third game of the Mercenaries Saga.

name: Mercenaries Saga 2: Order of the Sliver Eagle
description: “Mercenaries Saga 2: Order of the Silver Eagle” is a tactical simulation RPG where you fight through 32 stages with Claude, Captain of the Silver Eagles and his team.

name: Mercenaries Saga: Will of the White Lions
description: Mercenaries Saga 1 is a turn based tactical simulation RPG. It is the first of the series followed by many other solid simulation games: Mercenaries Blaze and Mercenaries Rebirth being the most recent addition to the series.

name: River City: Rival Showdown
description:
River City Ransom is back, rebuilt from the ground up! Rekindle old rivalries and relive past rumbles through a completely revamped story!

A re-release of the classic Nintendo 3DS sandbox brawler, this version of the game has been updated with tweaked controls, graphical upgrades, and a new online mode in the form of Double Dragon Duel 2023.

name: Fall of the Stick Knights
description: Fall of the Stick Knights is based on physics-controlled characters to player with friends up to 4 people. The game features has skin customization, nice fun hook mechanic and the clumsy characters, providing a lot of fun. Beware of the rain of crates.

name: Total War: Pharaoh
description: Total War: Pharaoh features a choice of eight faction leaders from three rich cultural hubs, with unique playstyles and diverse unit rosters. Whether you’re charming the courts as a peerless diplomat, charging into battle as an unwavering commander or causing chaos as a fearless warlord, become a leader that history will remember.

name: Super 56
description: Super 56 challenges players to overcome 56 genre-bending mini-games with the press of a single button. Compete in daily challenges, earn achievements, and destroy high scores. Outlandish chaos awaits you in Hell!

name: United Assault: World War 2
description: Fight on land, sea and air in an open world rogue lite FPS set in authentic theatres of of World War 2.

name: Spellsphere
description: Spellsphere is a fast-paced action roguelike set in the far future where society has reverted to an era similar to the medieval ages. You play as a mage locked up in a dungeon while an evil sorcerer has taken over the island. Can you escape the dungeon, travel the island, and defeat the Sorcerer?

name: Lair of Goblins
description: Casual action roguelike.

name: My Swordsman
description: Open world, multiplayer online tower defense confrontation game. Fight with teammates to upgrade your heroes, build bases, produce your own troops, command troops to form formations, and defend or attack enemy positions. Come and build your online fortress together.

name: Plumpy Uprising
description: Plumpy Uprising is a roguelite tower defense game featuring unique elders, random upgrade choices and a constantly shifting map. The difficulty increases every time you beat the game!

name: Little Witch Nobeta: Limited Edition
description:
The Limited Edition of Little Witch Nobeta includes the following:
- Game: Little Witch Nobeta
- Special Illustrated Box
- Script with Autograph (A4, 48 pages)
- B2 Tapestry
- Art book (B5, 32 pages)
- Soundtrack CD

name: Dark Cravings
description: Dark Cravings is a collection of pixel horror adventure titles to satisfy your deepest and darkest cravings.

name: Order from Caos 2
description:
Order from Caos 2 is a pixel art turn-based RPG and has more than 20 hours of gameplay, dozens of sidequests, items, special moves, and many puzzles to solve. Enemies walk across the maps and there are no random encounters. The players will walk through forests, cities, beaches, islands, temples, secret dungeons, hidden cities and will fight powerful creatures. The players will have a lot to do in the game if they don’t want to just follow the main story.

Order from Caos 2 has no connection to the events or characters shown in the first game in the series.

name: Monolith
description: Monolith is a story-driven, atmospheric point and click adventure game. You take on the survival struggle of Tessa Carter, 200 years in the future, who crashed onto a foreign planet and is now desperately searching for a way to leave this place alive.

name: Ilysia
description:
Embark on the adventure of a lifetime in the first true MMORPG made exclusively for Virtual Reality.

Ages ago, the Lagenans corrupted their world, causing a great rift that split the very planet itself. Fearing their own destruction, they created great portals powered by the blood of their gods, seeking to inhabit another nearby planet: Ilysia. Using their portals, the Lagenans entered Ilysia looking to establish a new home for their people where they could continue to practice their dark arts and thrive.

Will you help the Lagenans secure their hold on Ilysia, or defend the planet against them? The Choice is yours - fight, explore, and grow in power; alone or alongside your friends and foes as you face the challenges Ilysia holds.

In Ilysia, players will travel alongside one another or embark on solo journeys as they quest, fight, grow, and explore a multitude of unique areas with their own set of challenges throughout their adventures. These zones will present an increasing challenge of monsters, quests, dungeons, world bosses, caves, and large outdoor cities, all waiting to be explored, conquered, and to have their secrets revealed. Live the wonder, excitement, and glory days of MMOs like never before, in truly immersive VR.

name: PianoVision
description: Become a PianoVisionary with the world's premiere VR Music Teacher. PianoVision accelerates your piano learning using Mixed Reality and hand tracking. Connect a MIDI keyboard or play on a flat surface with the Virtual Piano!

name: Gacha Life 2
description:
The sequel to your favorite dress-up game is finally here! Create your own anime styled characters and dress them up in your favorite fashion outfits! With more customization than ever, you can create any character that you can imagine!

Choose from thousands of dresses, shirts, hairstyles, weapons, and much more! After designing your characters, enter the Studio and create your own scenes and stories! Select from a hundred backgrounds to create the perfect story!

name: Jak the Chicken
description: Adds over 18 levels and 900+ collectibles to the game and new powerups and adventures!

name: Revenge: Jane The Killer
description:
Revenge: Jane The Killer is a sequel to Reunion: A Jeff The Killer Game.
After the events of Reunion, Liu went back home. What he doesn't realize is that there is still one more person to worry about.

name: First Hand
description: First Hand is an official Hand Tracking demo built by Meta. Experience the magic of interacting with the virtual world directly with your hands. Use switches, levers, virtual UIs as you solve puzzles to build robotic gloves, and then experience their superpowers.

name: Portal: Forbidden Testing Tracks
description: Step into the shoes of Rachel as she embarks on a journey guided by the personality core named "SAIC," through the Forbidden Testing Track, Codename: "Quebeck Seven."
A celebration map for 3000 youtube videos. This was a speedmap and filmed progress.

name: TheHunter: Call of the Wild - Ambusher Pack
description: The Ambusher Pack contains an electronic caller, a lever-action rifle, and a takedown recurve bow, ideal for skillfully ambushing prey in the wild.

name: Our Magic Window
description: A traditional Yume Nikki fangame, where your objective is to explore and collect "textures" (effects).

name: Car Parking & Car Driving Simulator 2023
description: It's time to become a true driver and parking master!

name: Friends vs. Friends: Wired Wrecks
description: Wired Wrecks is the first Premium Expansion for Friends vs Friends

name: MX vs. ATV: Legends - Throwback Tracks
description: Compete on 7 fan favourite tracks from MX vs ATV Reflex, Alive, Encore, Untamed and Unleashed!

name: Wild Card Football: Ultimate Outfit Pack
description: The Ultimate Outfit Pack includes ten legendary cosmetic outfits that are each unique outfits that add style to any team and can match your team colors.

name: Wild Card Football: Legacy Players Kickoff Pack
description: Play as famed legacy players such as Barry Sanders, Walter Payton, Jerry Rice, and Dan Marino and their unique throwback outfits.

name: Wheels of Duty: Survival Modes
description: Team up with up to 4 people and take on AI attackers in Survival Modes

name: Corruption: Political Simulator Strategy
description: Sin descripción

name: Mutant Football League: Complete Bundle
description: This is the ultimate bundle for the complete Mutant Football League collection and your ticket to the most outrageous, hilarious, and brutal parody of professional American football. 7-on-7 arcade-style, football extravaganza where bloodthirsty superstar players hit the gridiron to battle it out in the most violent game ever played!

name: Forza Motorsport: Deluxe Edition
description: Race over 500 real-world cars including modern race cars and more than 100 cars new to Forza Motorsport. Make every lap count across 20 living environments with fan-favorite locations and multiple track layouts to master, each featuring live on-track scoring, fully dynamic time-of-day with weather and unique driving conditions that ensure no two laps ever look or play the same.

name: TheHunter: Call of the Wild - Reserve Cosmetics Bundle 1
description: Decorate your weapons, tents, and ground blinds with these unique cosmetics inspired by Medved-Taiga National Park, Vurhonga Savanna Reserve, and Parque Fernando. All in one bundle!

name: BAM
description:
Step into the thrilling world of BAM, the ultimate multiplayer battle game designed for mixed reality (MR). Whether you’re a seasoned gamer or new to the virtual realm, BAM offers a unique and captivating experience that transcends boundaries.

In BAM, you wield unprecedented control over your battlefield. Set up the tabletop arena anywhere you want, and adjust its scale and rotation. Then take charge of your miniature robot puppeteer-style.

Engage in an adrenaline-pumping fast-paced boxing match. Fire up your jetpack to take the battle up in the air. Collect power-ups to gain special powers, including an innovative “point-to-action” mechanic, offering a fresh perspective on third-person shooting in MR.

BAMs colorful, vibrant arenas pop in every room and are the stage for different game modes. Seize the crown, lose the bomb, or punch your opponents out of the field. Easy-to-master controls and stunning visuals redefine MR gaming, making BAM a must-play experience for all ages.

Play against AI-bots, or challenge other players all around the world. BAM guarantees instant fun and excitement. Competing against friends in the same room makes BAM the perfect party game.

Dive into the future of MR gaming. Enter the electrifying world of BAM.

name: You're Gonna Miss the Bus!
description:
Henry is running late for school ... again.

YGMTB is an endless runner where you play as a kid trying to make it to the bus on time. Jump, double jump, and slide your way past delivery bots, tree branches, couches, cats, drones, bollards, garden gnomes (non-feral) and myriad other obstacles.

name: Platform 10
description:
Every train carriage in Sydney is given a 4 digit long carriage number.
Back in the day, me and some mates of mine had a game where you'd have to take those numbers and make 10 out of em; using whatever math function you could think of. 5290? (9x0)+(5x2) = 10, Easy.

name: Jected: Rivals - Expansion Pack
description: Boost your roster with the Jected Expansion Pack!

name: TheHunter: Call of the Wild - Vurhonga Savanna Cosmetic Pack
description: The contents of this pack are cosmetic only and applicable to all weapons, tents, and ground blinds in the game. They can be previewed in-game for free before purchasing.

name: TheHunter: Call of the Wild - Medved-Taiga Cosmetic Pack
description: The contents of this pack are cosmetic only and applicable to all weapons, tents, and ground blinds in the game. They can be previewed in-game for free before purchasing.

name: TheHunter: Call of the Wild - Parque Fernando Cosmetic Pack
description: Decorate your weapons, tents, and ground blinds with these unique cosmetics inspired by Parque Fernando.

name: Sex Play: College Girls
description: A quick and dirty game made for your pleasure. Contains visual novel elements and a sex simulation part. Enjoy the story of two female students getting naughty in their dorm room.

name: Airship Defender
description: Airship Defender is a game of air defense, we try to grow our airship and protect it from enemies. Well of course the enemies are experienced, they come at us in waves and attack us, and worse, the bosses!

name: Overwatch 2: Season 7 - Rise of the Darkness
description: Get ready for the spookiest event of the year, as Overwatch 2 transforms into a haunted battleground. Halloween Terror is back with your favorite game modes - Junkenstein's Revenge and Wrath of the Bride and a new Events Shop to spend Overwatch Credits on limited-time skins, emotes, and highlight intros.

name: Horses.io: Horse Herd Racing
description: Saddle up and jump into horse & pony filled action

name: Install Fee Tycoon
description: Chaos3D, The popular game engine, has started charging developers each time their games are installed. They are also paying you to re-install those games. Get Rich, and destroy the video game industry in the process!

name: Tonight, I Die in My Sleep
description: Navigate broken memories in a powerless fantasy fueled equally by nightmares and confessional poetry.

name: Unavailed
description: What was once a very promising future, Mia's life has taken a turn for the worse. Now living alone, supported by money from her parents, any aspirations she once had are but a fleeting memory.

name: Mobile Store Simulator
description: Immerse yourself in the captivating world of Mobile Store Simulator! Build and manage your own tech haven, from store design to product selection. Experience the thrill of shaping a thriving mobile tech business and conquer the tech industry.

name: Forebloomed: Evergreen Edition
description: An action rogue-like about garden plants fighting back against the hungry pests that threaten their home. Spend the day blasting through hedges to find loot, but take care to make it back before dark! Gather synergistic items, confront formidable bosses, and play as several unique characters!

name: Animalia
description: As the next leader of your people, you visit the Summit, a meeting of world leaders. Your parents, the King and Queen, demand you find a marriage proposal while your here. Choose your mate and get swept away in the adventure of your courtship. Your choices will change the outcome of your life.

name: Forza Motorsport: Race Day Car Pack
description: Race Day Car Pack features 8, new-to-Forza cars built exclusively for the racetrack!

name: Forza Motorsport: Car Pass
description: Expand your Forza Motorsport garage with 30 extra cars at one low price!

name: Flightmare
description: Indie horror game that will take your adrenaline to another level.

name: Geist
description: The Empire has enlisted you in the Geist Squad. Complete missions based on WWII in order to fulfill the Empire. Each one will be harder than the last in this WWII FPS. You the Player will have to fight through the enemies of the Empire. You will face heavily armed soldiers based on events in WWII.

name: Stand Your Ground
description: Defend attacks from enemies from all directions within a limited time. Only by making full use of the differences in each tower and choosing appropriate random rewards can you survive.

name: Multiverser
description: Multiverser is an action game with rouglike elements, in which you defeat hordes of enemies who precede clashes with bosses. After each skirmish you gain currency, which makes you develop your characters stronger. All this to save the multiverse and clean it from all sorts of monsters.

name: Command: Showcase - Operation Desert Falcon
description: The year is 2027 and France's position in the Sahel has become untenable. A coup d'état in Chad has brought an anti-colonial regime to power. Militant groups are seizing foreign assets and government security forces have gone over to the United Sahel Liberation Front.

name: Expest
description: An arcade-inspired game all about collecting cheese to fulfill your needs. Avoid being exterminated throughout all the levels as you see all the tricks that are used to stop your quest.

name: Little Mages
description: Defend your castle from various hordes of enemies that seek to invade it! Little Mages is a casual pixel art game with roguelite elements where you accumulate knowledge and learn powerful spells of your choice to defeat all your enemies.

name: Athos
description: Welcome to a captivating journey into the world of Athos. Build a formidable base to protect yourself from the wild and unpredictable environment, and master the art of taming mighty dinosaurs to be your loyal companions. Welcome to a world where survival is not just a choice but a way of life!

name: The Fall of Elements
description: The Fall of Elements is an action-adventure game set in an ancient dungeon. You are chosen by the Elements to find an evil enemy. Solve puzzles, explore a vast dungeon, overcome obstacles in your way and fight forbidden magic.

name: Wild Card Football: Ultimate Edition
description: Wild Card Football is a fun pick-up-and-play arcade-style football game featuring 7v7 team-focused gameplay with the unique Wild Card system that lets you change the course of the action in an instant with special power-ups and rule-breaking abilities.

name: Wild Card Football: Deluxe Edition
description: Wild Card Football is a fun pick-up-and-play arcade-style football game featuring 7v7 team-focused gameplay with the unique Wild Card system that lets you change the course of the action in an instant with special power-ups and rule-breaking abilities.

name: Wild Card Football
description: Wild Card Football is a fun pick-up-and-play arcade-style football game featuring 7v7 team-focused gameplay with the unique Wild Card system that lets you change the course of the action in an instant with special power-ups and rule-breaking abilities.

name: Reel-istic Fishing
description: Hook, harpoon, and sell fish to venture deeper. What lies at the bottom?

name: Gearbits
description: Fast paced mecha themed third person shooter.

name: Sapphic Space
description: A women-loving-women choices-matter adult visual novel in a sci-fi setting! Experience lesbian love with an android on a spaceship. Play as Miss Puter, the ship computer, and influence the story towards romance with diverse lady characters and multiple endings.

name: Hearts of Iron IV: Arms Against Tyranny
description: Write a new history of Scandinavia and Finland in Arms Against Tyranny, a new expansion for Hearts of Iron IV. Build a war machine to defy potential aggressors, or chart a neutral course with an arms industry fueling war far from your own shores.

name: Samurai Beat
description: Slice bamboo to the rhythm while dodging projectiles to maintain your flow and pace. Will you conquer the beat and become a true samurai master?

name: Jorel's Brother and the Most Important Game of the Galaxy: Chapter 3 - The Final Rave
description: Jorel's Brother and the Most Important Game of the Galaxy: Chapter 3 - The Final Rave is the third and final chapter in Jorel's Brother and the Most Important Game of the Galaxy.

name: I Believe in Capybara Supremacy!
description: We are the chosen one to take care of Capybara, a one-of-a-kind creature that lives on Earth and has the potential to destroy the world when it gets angry, in order to help it control its anger and prevent the destruction of the world!

name: Chronicles of Vaeltaja: In Search of the Great Wanderer
description:
A fantasy grid-based dungeon crawler role-playing game set in the kingdom of Twin Falls, a lush and colourful world created with beautiful pixel graphics.

Chronicles of Vaeltaja: In Search of the Great Wanderer takes you back to the golden era of pc gaming, when role-playing games like Dungeon Master, Might and Magic, Eye of the Beholder, Lands of Lore, WIzardry and Ultima ruled the world. Gather your party of six adventurers and embark on a journey through the colourful kingdom of Twin Falls where sunny fields, lush forests, misty swamps and dark dungeons await to be explored!

name: Costly Adventure
description: Costly Adventure is a Match-3 game with RPG elements. Exciting talent trees and itemization will quickly change the way you play. Will your party withstand the ever increasing tolls of the bridge troll?

name: Stellar Stroll
description: Explore the cosmos with your furry friend and collect antimatter to open portals to different celestial worlds. Use gravity and momentum to navigate through planets, asteroids, and comets while avoiding black holes and space debris.

name: Zodiac: Hellish Memory
description: Challenge your ability, your reflexes and your memory to avoid from the bullets to defeat the zodiac spirits while memorize the cards and survive of a real bullet hell with difficulties for all playstyles.

name: Blocky Balloons
description: Blocky Balloons is a block-pushing "sokoban-like" puzzle game. Push, slide, and undo your way through 40+ puzzles to get those balloons!

name: MidnightKing
description: Strengthen, Fight, Explore. Use spells, weapons, and enhancements to create your unique playstyle. Explore to fights bosses/enemies from elemental origins and uncover secrets of the world of Vathenic.

name: Jected: Rivals
description: Eject into the world of high-octane stunts, bumps and automobiles! Fight off the competition and become the greatest Rival!

name: Humankind: Heritage Edition
description:
Humankind is a historical strategy game, where you'll be re-writing the entire narrative of human history and combining cultures to create a civilization that's as unique as you are.

The Heritage Edition includes:
(Physical release only)
- Q-Card Cover
- Double-sided Unit & Tech Tree Poster

(Physical & Digital release)
- Notre-Dame Pack
- Cultures of Africa Pack
- Cultures of Lain America Pack
- Edgar Allen Poe & Boudicca Avatar Sets & Player Icons
- Exclusive Player Profile Decoration & Symbols Set

name: Living Legends: Voice of the Sea
description: The dark seas are calling...

name: Harvest Island
description: Living with your family on a remote island, you discover a sinister purpose of your existence. Look for a way to escape your idyllic farm life. Offer your Harvest Offering to the gods to keep up with the façade. Question everything and fake your blissful farming days.

name: Space Wreck
description: A Fallout-inspired post-apocalyptic RPG in space with an extreme focus on role-playing. Inch wide, miles deep - intentionally short yet surprisingly deep and branching adventure with multiple gameplay styles. Combat 100% optional.

name: Forza Motorsport
description: Out-build the competition in the new career. Race your friends in adjudicated multiplayer events. Compete in over 500 cars on world-famous tracks with cutting-edge AI, advanced physics, tire and fuel strategy, and driver and safety ratings.

name: Long Gone Days
description: A modern-day JRPG that imagines a world of war. Overcome language barriers, forge unlikely friendships, and find hope amidst conflict.

name: Zabb World: Secret Stories
description: Welcome to "Zabb World", a virtual world where you can own it, make new friends, and chat. You can also do lots of fun activities together with your hottest character.

name: Disorderly
description:
Disorderly is a daily trivia game where you try to put a group of items in the correct order, based on some criteria, in as few guesses as possible. In addition to the daily games, there are occasionally extra games that are either too difficult or niche to use as the daily game.

New games go live at (or sometimes shortly after) 12:00 AM Eastern Time.

name: Shoot-Out!
description: You're a wandering lawman on the trail of an outlaw gang. Beat them in a test of reflexes and bring peace to the Wild West!

name: Chaomin
description: Sin descripción

name: Fun Chess: Definitive Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Draw and Color: Kawaii - Complete Edition +
description: Sin descripción

name: Edna & Harvey Bundle
description: Classic point-and-click adventure gameplay like in the good old days! Experience these two classics full of bizarre characters, wacky (and sometimes twisted) humor, crazy dialogue and challenging puzzles.

name: Jigsaw Ice Princess
description: Solve 45 beautiful princess jigsaws in a magical ice world

name: Flesharmonic
description: It's a 20-maps megawad of raw and grilled meat to satisfy your insatiable appetite for wads!

name: Two Lane
description:
Two Lane is a fast-paced one-button game.

You control a car driving on a two lane highway. Press a button to change lanes and hold a button to go faster. The road is interrupted by the grass patches. You will slow down when you touch a grass patch.

The game is over when you slow down completely.

name: Story Craft
description:
Story Craft is a story-writing simulation game using ChatGPT.
Register your friends as characters and create your own story!

name: Adrift Program
description: Supply energy to many spaceships in this small, chill resource and time management game, inspired by Overcooked. A Cooked-Like, if you will!

name: EarthKart
description: 3D Google Earth Driving Simulator

name: Halloween Defense
description: The top of strategy battle game! Build villages and train units to defeat ghouls

name: Goddess Detective 3
description: Goddess Detective It is a sequel to the second film. Let you feel the game better with an immersive experience. If you really like puzzle games. This is a very good casual moment game.

name: Sasha's Stupid Coffee Shop
description: Start from the bottom and work your way to the top of selling the world's best coffee!

name: Spot the Diff 3D
description: The first ever brand new 3D Spot the difference game!

name: Swords & Crystals
description: Delve into a vast, magical medieval open world. This top-down MMORPG invites you to fight other players, battle epic bosses and to master various skills. Level up, complete quests, solve puzzles and gear up to attain glory and prestige by dominating leaderboards and earning achievements!

name: Meikyuu no Dollpolis
description: It's an action game where you advance through a mysterious dungeon whose shape changes every time you enter, while strengthening the functions of your aircraft.

name: Defendor
description: Defendor is a throwback to the fast paced arcade games of the 80s.A retro style, arcade shooter where you upgrade your base to increase the capabilities of your ship, unlock new weapons, ships and cause more mayhem.Defend your base until everyone makes it into the escape ship.

name: Leap to the Top+
description: You are a frog, leaping automatically every second to the top. But can you beat all 7 of the grueling levels along with defeating powerful foes to learn how to Leap to the Top? Can you get the best times for true mastery along with collecting all of the hidden collectables in each stage?

name: Scare Girl 2
description: A game at a haunted house and you're trying to collect 10 radio to open an escape door from a killer.

name: Where's My Loot?
description: Where's My Loot? is a hidden object game in a fantasy world. The loot from your last adventure was lost. Search around and find all your precious items back.

name: Stations in Seoul: Open World Card RPG
description: Immerse yourself in the captivating universe of our enthralling prequel to Find with Seoul. This game beautifully weaves together the exciting elements of a card game RPG with a fascinating narrative that propels you on a quest for continuous development.

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Baby Animals 2
description: Puzzles of baby animals!

name: Vapor Tanks
description: Explore Cyberspace in Vapor Tanks, an arcade 3D shooter with a focus on satisfying gameplay, addictive replayability, and surrealist visuals. It features a 30 level long single player, and Online PVP up to 4 players.

name: Escape the Dark Tower
description: Step into a realm of mystery and magic with Escape the Dark Tower, a captivating escape room adventure in charming pixel art.

name: Guerra Sangrenta
description: “Guerra Sangrenta” has many attracting game modes, with its unique optimization technique, such as Classic Competition, Casual Game, Adventure mode etc. Join to find all the wild gears and weapons for your taste, run through the storm of shots and shells. Exciting battles await you!
